1.review_text: This hotel is located right in the heart of Sukhumvit shops and entertainment. It even has a walkway to access the Terminal 21 shopping mall nearby. The hotel was very helpful in providing facilities for our young baby. A clean cot and baby bath was provided. The staff were helpful, polite and always service gave with a smile. The rooms were just big enough and generally facilities were very good. The showers have a slight issue with not being able to turn the on/off easily when wet, but other than that no problems with this hotel. Breakfast was good and again staff very helpful.

2.review_text: Wonderful hotel. From the moment you check in the staff are attentive and very welcoming. The rooms are very nice and have all your would expect from a true 5 star hotel. The weekend breakfast buffet is fantastic and the staff at breakfast are just wonderful. Great gym and great pool area.

3.review_text: First of all,  I would like to say thank you very much to Sofitel team and all departments of Sofitel for organized room and decorated for pre birthday of mine. Thank you for special cake and room upgraded to Opera suite.   I never ever disappointed whenever I spend time at Sofitel Bangkok. It's real five stars and luxury hotel as it is.  Friendly staffs and all staffs said "Happy Birthday" to me when I walked around hotel area. That was amazing day  and feel very special.   It's worth the stay and comfy every time I choose here.

4.review_text: Last Saturday, I went to visit and took coffee at Le Macaron that I so appreciated with your staffs (K.Praew and K.Pim). Your staffs is very great service, sincerely touch with me and her will ask and recommend drink and service with me and my friends. Thank you again for great service from your staffs and your hotel.   Oatt

5.review_text: Well I cannot really tell you guys what I had been through in Sofitel. It was so far the best hospitality hotel i had in Bangkok. Thank you to K Ing, N. Torfan, K Macky, N Bambi, N Chulli , N Benja , Ted-San and of course finally the hotel manager P Thomas.  It was really an honour to stay with you are Sofitel Sukhimvit with the priceless hospitality and of course with all these pandemic moments that we had. It was truly an unforgettable moments that i had stayed with Sofitel. Hopefully we will have to have continuous relationship to grow together.

6.review_text: The arrival to our 5-night stay was bumpy with a couple of misunderstandings and malfunctions - the immediate recovery effort led by duty manager Mr Noporn very much turned the situation around and we ended up having a very nice stay indeed. Breakfast was extremely attentive and friendly under the young German manager’s care (the croissants and baguette are to die for), restaurant Belga on the rooftop served exquisite mussels and an excellent steak tartare - thank you Peter and team - and the Exec lounge staff was very friendly. The superb 30th floor lounge was closed (I assume due to Covid savings needs) however the care and friendliness on display almost made up for it! Housekeeping was spot on. Of course the location is hard to beat and the new skywalk to the BTS, or just…

7.review_text: Good service.Very friendly and helpful staff. Great place to visit while you stay in Bangkok. The hotel is located near BTS and shopping malls. Breakfast, afternoon tea (macaron is recommended) and spa were good. Nice place to stay and relax. There is a Belga rooftop bar at 25th floor which provide nice view and tasty food.

8.review_text: A three day stay. The room was very comfortable, although the bed was a little soft. A good selection of channels on the TV. The breakfast was outstanding! The top floor bar was good with friendly staff. We tried the cheese platter which was superb!

9.review_text: This was my second time at Sofitel Sukhumvit. The location is great, only a 3 Minute walk to BTS Asoke. The staff is very friendly. Unfortunately I don't remember the name of the German guy from Breakfast and at Tea Time at the Lounge, he was very friendly and gave some good tips in order to safe money for some sightseeing trips. Breakfast is good, but on weekends it takes too long to get a coffee. The checkin was friendly, but I didn't get any advise about the room, not sure if I got an upgrade or not. I couldn't remember what i booked, but I believe I didn't get an upgrade this time. I got my welcome drink and my points were credited the next day. Unfortunately the usual Lounge was not open, but not much you can do about that. For a 5 Star Hotel, there were not a lot of…

10.review_text: Good location. Near BTS and teminal 21 shopping mall.  Staff so nice and so cute. (RSV,Front,Belga,Spa,Vaula) Breakfast is Good and macaron at Le macaron is the best. Good view at Belga rooftop bar. Best choice for couples.

11.review_text: There is good choice to take package Valentines which included Suite room 1 night , afternoon tea set , club , massage, voucher Dinner and breakfast. That is so great that we can do everything in 1 day 1 night , and Yes!! Many people took it for celebrations but what I saw is they can manage well. Whatever after we feedback they take action immediately as very professional. The food is so delicious. Massage is so good . All staffs so nice and warm. Also would like to special thanks to K.Nopphon (manager) for all convenience to make our day become good memory. That why Sofitel is always first choice for us. 😊

12.review_text: One of our best experience celebrating my wife's BD in the Imperial Suite room with the size over 200sqm, with full size living room, bathroom, small kitchen area, and private outdoor Jacuzzi on the 27th floor of the hotel.  The room was great with high quality bed sheet, clean and the location was perfect, just only 5 mins walk to Terminal 21 shopping mall and BTS.  The hotel prepared a surprise BD cake to make it more memorable and the overall service was really nice.  We have got a chance to also try Belgian foods at Belga, the rooftop bars which is only 2 floors away from our room and the food was great, especially the Mussels in the pot which they cook with Hoegardenn beer and White wine, definitely will need to be back there again for dinner soon.

13.review_text: My sister and I had a wonderful stay at this beautiful and well located hotel for 2 months.   The hotel managers and team were very professional and absolutely attentive to every detail. They really made sure that our stay was a memorable one.  Mrs. Kalpana Khadka ( Manager) and her diligent team members were very passionate about service and customer satisfaction . She definitely went well above and beyond our expectations in providing excellent service in a very kind and professional manner.  The Prestige Suite was beautifully decorated and had all the amenities that could be expected in a five star hotel. Thank you to Ms. Polly who was always kind and helpful.   Enjoying our meals at Voilà restaurant was also a delightful experience. Ms Siriying and Mr. Moritz were always…

14.review_text: We stayed here twice and both trips were impressed, food quality, service, spa, staff, all great. Even during Covid-19 staff less than usual but the hotel keep all quality meet 5 stars standard. Viola , Le Macaron and Belga ate great quality of food please try during your stay.

15.review_text: Stayed at Sofitel Bangkok Sukhumvit, I love this place because of all staff, they go out of their way to take care of me. Thanks Dew & Nan Nan and all the hard working ladies at The Club Team : Chulii & Benja & Mild. You are the great.

1.review_text: Bright and super clean room with superb river view. Easy access to Icon siam department store by hotel free boat shuttle which depart every half an hour until 10.00 pm. The Author’s lounge is a must place to visit for Afternoon tea. Good memorable for us.

2.review_text: One of the best hotel in Bangkok. Service here is second to none! Got to try their Italian restaurant at Ciao, pasta was perfectly cooked. If you have time for Japanese Kaiseki, Kinu by Takagi is one of the best Kaiseki I have ever been to.

3.review_text: We are taking advantage of amazing rates and the ability to travel in country to enjoy Thailand before it (hopefully soon) goes back to normal.   The MO has a package called Experience the Legend which we took full advantage of (and will again very soon).   Rather than save the cash we paid what would normally (roughly) be the price for a basic room and instead got a Chao Phraya suite.   It was absolutely lovely.  To the point that I think I could live there.  There is nothing we can criticise about our stay.  We had the best time, the most lovely staff and came away very happy with the firm intention of returning and repeating before the offers end.  Fabulous.

4.review_text: The hotel has renovated its rooms a year ago. Everything in the building is new but they preserve the legendary oriental vibe. Our room is facing the IconSiam department store, which is spectacular at night.

5.review_text: I was beyond impressed with what you have done for us, especially at the spa! It was something definitely unforgettable! I did not expect whatsoever that your service team would do such a thoughtful, surprising and special thing for us! I personally loved that you treated us like VIPs, regardless of the way we dressed or looked. I learned first-hand about the “Service Excellent” during my 4-day stay (outside the class room I attended at your hotel 3-4 years ago :).  I will, for sure, make my time to stay there again, hopefully, soon. Thank you so much everyone at the Mandarin Oriental Bangkok that you were so committed to delivering excellent services, Khun Jeng in particular. I believe that she was  the key person behind the memorable and surprising experience at the spa :). Keep it up!…

6.review_text: There is a service-minded butler (Khun Patimaporn). She took care us very well. There is a stunning view of Chao Praya River via our window. The hotel is very good decorated. There are a lot of interesting history of this hotel and you can visit their history by the picture were decorated on the wall. All of amenities are good quality.  One more thing, The breakfast and dinner at River Terrence are not good enough. The bread is so hard and sticky. The steak is not soft enough.

7.review_text: Thanks for an amazing visit again !!! We are so pleased and happy every time when we visit Oriental Hotell .  We love it all from the amazing breakfast to afternoon tea and our fantastic lunch in Normandie   The experience of having a dinner in our suite was amazing   The drinks where fantastic with the setting and music in Bamboo Bar   The friendly staff by the pool and all the good guys in front of the hotell  We just love the whole thing  Best  Kwanyoo and Anders  Hope see you soon again!!!

8.review_text: best stay in Bangkok, nice and beautiful hotel with warm welcome and service, the food are excellent. Big pool and good food. Best breakfast and afternoon tea room (Author's lounge). Also, good location, can travel to icon Siam for shopping by hotel boat transfer

9.review_text: If you are planning to celebrate your anniversary at a special venue with full of surprises, this is the perfect hotel in Bangkok to have remarkable & unforgettable memories in the room, at dinner and at Bamboo Bar!

10.review_text: I don't write reviews very often, but only when thoroughly deserved. The Mandarin Oriental BKK certainly checks all the boxes.    This establishment is all about the people, and you find that out when you get to know them. From the GM, who is on his second sting, to the Head of Guest Relations, who has been there for 31 years, all the way to our wonderful driver, who has been there for 29 years !! It says a lot about how an operation is run, when you see so much loyalty. It certainly gets reflected on how guests are treated.  As for the facilities, I'll simply say that their historical renovations are absolutely magnificent, well deserving for such an iconic hotel, not just in Bangkok, but the global Mandarin Oriental family.  Absolute no doubt that it will remain our #1…

11.review_text: This is the forth time of stay in one year since last year, I still love and think this hotel is the best hotel for me. This time of stay is for sister's birthday, I requested birthday cake and it's blueberry cheesecake.

12.review_text: The hospitality was very impressive. Room is very functional, clean, and tidy. The floor butler service was very professional. Room service was also impressive. We ordered pasta for kid. They prepared food in cute kid’s plate. There are 2 pools, one for kids and the other for adults.  Spa was good. Only thing I don’t like is we have to wait for boat to cross the river to spa.

13.review_text: Amazing place to stay! Great service and atmosphere.  Great location with access to all around.  Breakfast with views over the river combined with great service and food is unforgettable! Thank you and see you soon!

14.review_text: The Mandarin Oriental is a wonderful place to stay. The service was professional and thoughtful and the facilities are top class. Everything about the Mandarin Oriental is designed to create a positive guest experience.

15.review_text: It was our first visit to MO bangkok. We got upgraded to the Mandarin room (as it was supposed to be our wedding day). The room was spacious and beautifully decorated. I find the bathroom layout a bit odd though, as the toilet is right next to the shower. The housekeeping service was impeccable, our room was always neat and clean. The butler service was a nice touch as well.  Breakfast was wonderful. They offered a-la-carte menu only because of the pandemic, but the menu was quite substantial. Everything was tasty and good quality. The service was a bit slow, but I didn’t really mind.  We dined at Ciao Terrazza on our first night. Advance reservation recommended if you want a table by the river. The food was, overall, tasty and of generous portion. The staff was super nice and…

16.review_text: Bright and super clean room with superb river view. Easy access to Icon siam department store by hotel free boat shuttle which depart every half an hour until 10.00 pm. The Author’s lounge is a must place to visit for Afternoon tea. Good memorable for us.

17.review_text: One of the best hotel in Bangkok. Service here is second to none! Got to try their Italian restaurant at Ciao, pasta was perfectly cooked. If you have time for Japanese Kaiseki, Kinu by Takagi is one of the best Kaiseki I have ever been to.

29.review_text: The Mandarin Oriental is a wonderful place to stay. The service was professional and thoughtful and the facilities are top class. Everything about the Mandarin Oriental is designed to create a positive guest experience.

Advance reservation recommended if you want a table by the river. The food was, overall, tasty and of generous portion. The staff was super nice and…

1.review_text: Do you believe in love at first sight? The very first time I visit the residence on Thonglor is absolutely the place where it makes my heart beat so fast. Beautiful decoration,warm welcome,the rooftop pool and the hospitality of all the staff especially k’pae made my day so special. I found it’s not just a residence but it’s a paradise on Thonglor.

2.review_text: The hotel is very convenient because it is beside the main street and the room is clean and tidy. This hotel would be considered as first choice if we need to stay around here again. Gratefully thanks to K. Aun and K. Poon that assisted us while we are staying here.

3.review_text: The manager was upset to put the customer.  Used impolite speech with an offensive tone and emotion to the customer  The room was very dirty.  There are dry toothpaste stains on the sink.  The air conditioner has mold on it.  The air conditioner was not cold, the room so small, cramped and uncomfortable, the TV is not clear, the sound of other rooms can be heard.  The only good thing is the ordinary view.  But it must be on the 6th floor and above. The staff told me that if writing a full rating review, they will give me free breakfast. It has been worst!!!

4.review_text: The hotel was nice and close to Bts station , staff Pae helpful and great service. Recommended !!!!   But only i don’t like the room next to me they are talking very loud , the room should be more soundproof.

5.review_text: Service mind, this hotel can go easy. Make me feel comfortable. room is very clean. Price is so cheap. Location at Tonglor it very nice for traveler.  I will come again soon 😃 I hope after covid 19 better this place will popular ❤️✨

6.review_text: I like to stay here they have a very good service by K.Pae good room easy to go to the nearest place bed and blankets very nice they have a Gym and swimming pool on the rooftop when you have an exercise with a good view in Bangkok

7.review_text: Mr Aun assists us with everything. The room is great for its price. The location is great for traveling around the city. The facility is covered with everything from swimming pool to fitness center. Highly recommend

8.review_text: Good view, clean and comfortable. Rooftop pool is wonderful. Good location with modern and minimalist vibe. All of the staff(especially พี่นุ้ย,พี่อั้น)  are provide excellent service. Overall, everything is so good! We will come back for suer .

9.review_text: For all the services is good the staff so kind and helpful and the room was so clean food so delicious! 2 NIGHT SHIFT staff poon and aun they help me alot when i get drunk they help to send me to the room and bring my stuff to there this is my second time here will be 3rd and 4th for sure!

10.review_text: The hotel is nice , full of facilities, ultra veiw of swimming pool, fitness room and minimart. Full furnished , sofa , washing matchine , bath tub, kitchen corner. Good location , 2.0 km from BTS Thonglor . A lot of restuarant near by. we will back to here again.

11.review_text: Just a really cute little hotel. The staff were good and the rooms are lovely. They come with mini kitchen facilities and even a washing machine. Even in the smallest rooms. The bed was soft and the linens very clean. The place feels new and the whole environment and facilities are great. Check in and Check out was easy. There is free parking, but it is limited, so reserve a space in advance. The location in Thonglor, Bangkok is perfect with all kinds of great stuff about.   The only 2 things that should be mentioned are the walls are quite thin, you can hear your neighbours talking if they are loud. Also the 100 THB room service menu, while edible, is teeny tiny portions and not great. But that doesn't matter because there are great options at your doorstep as long as you want…

12.review_text: Room was very nice with good view Lobby looks great. Welcoming atmosphere. Receptionist are very good. K.yuy with K. Hafish are kind and have good service mind. Very good. Location is easy to find. ❤️😊

13.review_text: Room was very nice with good view Lobby looks cool like some coffee shop Breakfast was very taste plenty of food to choose Location also good to some nice restaurant  Thank ziu for K.Yui,K.Jin to take care of me.

14.review_text: The staff names Poon and the bell man were providing me the best service. I felt warm at heart with the cleanliness  and luxury atmosphere when comparing to the price. This place is very cheap price with high quality.

15.review_text: The hotel is clean with a convenient location for us and the best bang for the bucks! The hotel receptionist Un and Neay are very friendly and helpful.  We are frequent visitor and will be back again soon.

1.review_text: I stay 1 day at River view + Bacony side.Here was Great room service with HBD cake and Relaxing from Chaopaya River view. I enjoin with my love at Bacony side. It’s best value from credit cash back Promotio . And Breakfast is yummy, Clean and comfortable.

2.review_text: The next 2 cafe at Shangri-la Hotel, Bangkok is amazing! Especially hotel staff "Keng, Koi, Aod and Supervisor are hospitality and helpful!  This is the best seafood buffet ever! Do not hesitate to try!  others than that indian food here is so nice as well 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

3.review_text: Here is a Next 2 Café. At Shangri-La Hotel. The dinner was perfect 👌 and delicious 😋 that was too good and great place to have a dinner with your family. And it is a good service from K.. Yuwannee and K. Aod, thx for your best service tonight.

4.review_text: I had a dinner here with my mom .It was my second time in one month. I can’t stop coming here. The food is really great and the service from Ms. Yuwannee is even better. I have not thing to say more than thank you very much. She made my mom so happy and everything is so wonderful. I will be back again and again.

5.review_text: We had elderly and children on this trip. We enjoyed our stay. The food was good. The rooms are clean with great views. The staff were very eager to help when we asked for instruction about taking a boat ride to Icon Siam.

6.review_text: We books a Riverview room for 1 night. The staffs are very attentive especially K.Toss on the front desk. K.Ning from the pool-side spa also give us a very good services. The Chinese Dim Sum are very delicious and has a great price. Do try to visit. The only downside is the morning breakfast which is a bit underwhelm.   Overall, we still decide to give it 5 stars because we enjoy our stay a lot.

7.review_text: The Shangri La is supposed to be one of the better hotels along the river, alongside the Mandarin Oriental and the Peninsula, but my 2-night stay here has left me very underwhelmed and I highly urged everyone to not stay here when travel resumes and spend the money at either the Peninsula, Mandarin Oriental, or the recently renovated millennium Hilton across. Think having stayed at both Mandarin and Peninsula, i can safely make my claim that that Shang is the worst out of the three.  I can understand the tired and dated rooms, after all, things are still functional. The inconsistent service, especially from the door staff, left little to be desired. As gate keepers to anyone coming into or leaving the hotel they really give me the impression that they are just very tired at…

8.review_text: I always fall in love with Shangri-La scented once step in at the lobby. In room welcome with sanitizer set, Bedroom area is very well maintenance, all wooden furnitures, decorations and floor not even single area make you feel oldish.  Due to current situation some area had been blocked, I may recommend to put proper signage in advance as first I had to parked in another building quite far. Another case I walked from Level 1 to BTS by following hotel signage but in the end the way temporary closed. However their staffs were very helpful and eager in their service.  Place is nice, foods are superb and excellent service.!!!

9.review_text: I love Shangrila. Great staff, great location, both by the river , but also for skytrain and the boat shuttles to Icon Siam and Asiatique. Horizon club is a benefit I really appreciate . Its just a perfect stay

10.review_text: Me and my girlfriend just had lunch in Shang-Palace which was our first time in this Chinese restaurant. We recommend to order Xiao Long Bao which was so superb and P’Pairat was our staff who serviced kindly always took care us all the special time we spent there. Anyway, all staff are so friendly and welcoming service.

11.review_text: I would like to send a big thanks to K. Jose Mao for this wonderful meal. I’m really impressed with the service here especially the service from P’Yuwannee . Moreover, the food quality is higher than what I expected. It’s not surprising why there are a lot of customers everyday. I enjoy with all the dishes but my favorite is Japanese counter. Many thanks to Chef Ton for the sushi roll. I love this place!!!!

12.review_text: Sercvice is good, all staff serving with pleasure (Yuwannee, MAO, Keng).   Food is plenty with many types; Japanese, Chinese, Italian; however, seafood is not much fresh as it should be which heard from other comments. expect because of the situation currently as not many people coming during COVID

13.review_text: My boyfriend forgot his iPad on a taxi. The hotel checked the camera and we got the taxi driver's phone number. We called him and he brought the iPad to us. The service here is very nice and quick. Thank you for the duty manager Khun Samrit and Khun Anuwat customer service. The view of the hotel is good and peace. Chi spa is very nice. Thank you for making my day : )

14.review_text: I had a chance to have dinner at next 2 restaurant. And felt quite impressed with really good professional service provided by khun pong restaurant manager and khun bam, the friendly and helpful receptionist.  Also, the seafood is quite great, i will surely pay a repeat visit to this nice place again soon.

15.review_text: we  here with family while covid 19 situation , room has stunning view  large window we can see river from our room and great price  and we brought dinner seafoods  buffet with king crab and lobster yummy

1.review_text: I have just finished my 15 days quarantine and I couldn’t be more satisfied. Very clean and comfortable room. Food is excellent with a wide range to choose from. Staff are what really makes the hotel. Everyone is incredibly kind, patient and accommodating. I would particularly like to thank Martin at reception who is very friendly and hardworking. A true professional. I will be staying here again.

2.review_text: An excellent place to choose for ASQ.  Food has consistently been to a very high standard and something to look forward to.  All the staff have been responsive and the general manager takes the time to make a personal call to ensure the ASQ experience is as pleasant as it can be.  Have stayed in another five star ASQ hotel and the Lancaster has been a much better experience.  Would highly recommend and are looking forward to using the hotel again and restaurant when we leave ASQ.

3.review_text: I booked ASQ (15days) with Lancaster Bangkok. They're so informed. All stuffs know everything, they can answer every question that you ask. They also have anything that you need. I ask for office chair, AA batteries, Yoga mat, dumbbell, leather shoe cleaning, Limousine, unsweet coffee, I got them all.

4.review_text: High light of the hotel probably is the meals provided. There are several menus that we can choose during the 15 days stay : Thai, Western and vegetarian. Each menu offers starter, main as well as dessert. The quality is excellent, presentation is nice . We are quite satisfied, actually what provided are too much for us.🙂 Besides, the service is excellent as you can expect from 5 stars hotel.  Room is standard size, enough space for my husband’s spinning bike and my yoga mat😀  The only down side is the hotel has limited space . When you were allowed to go outside, there is almost no space to walk around but this doesn’t bother us too much as we were only allowed for 45 mins/ day.  On the last day, we were served with a real 5-star room service, what a surprise! Overall, we were quite happy with the hotel.…

5.review_text: I have been reading and researching quite many hotels since we has many conditions for our quarantine stay but I found the best option which is Lancaster Bangkok  They are provided full information including some picture and before we arrived they are make sure every details.Then we are check in smoothly until now we're almost half way of our quarantine stay.  Staff was so nice, professional and kind (always fast service upon our request) Also Piyavate's nurse responsibly and efficiently. Food are excellent every single meals, varieties of food, options for western and Thai and Vegan available. I was impress that hotel serving food with craft food box.  So far nothing to complaint at and I was happy to choose the right choice  We are looking forward to come back as normal guest.

6.review_text: Spent my 15 day ASQ at the Lancaster Bangkok and found the planning and  execution of all aspects of this process of a very high standard. From  dealing with the reservations team to check out was flawless.And the courtesy  of all staff certainly mitigated the feeling of isolation. Whilst my room was very comfortable and the availability of Netflix was vital in staying entertained.I found the room a little dated.

7.review_text: It was an enjoyable, relaxing and comfortable stay except for some stress moments taking the test and awaiting results, but that is normal feeling and all good.  The only ""complaint" we had was the open space was not very comfortable as it was behind huge exhaust, so we couldn't really get to breathe fresh air.  We were told that was the only place allowed.  Aside from that, all was very good. Room was excellent - he wanted Executive Apartment but was not available, so we had Deluxe Suite.  Very home feel and allowed me to work from hotel in the living area while my wife was comfortable in the bedroom. F&B was excellent, great choices of food everyday.  They were very flexible and accommodating with our special requests.  And, to cap it off, a beautiful “fine dining” last…

8.review_text: Excellent in every way. Very friendly and highly professional staff.   Despite covid 19 quarantine making it a pleasant stay to let you forget the inconvenience caused by 14 days in your room. I surely would like to recommend it as the perfect place to stay in Bangkok

9.review_text: Although the place looks nice inside I do not recommend this hotel. Room was very small for 4 persons. The area near the hotel is very unpleasant. Very big traffic in the neighbourhood. The restaurant is fine.

10.review_text: I spent my 15 day ASQ at Lancaster Hotel and the entire experience exceeded my expectations.  Check-in was quick and efficient and you’re guided to your room within minutes.  My deluxe room was a good size, clean and modern with all the amenities you’d expect — large flat screen TV/cable, fast high speed internet (WiFi), fully stocked minibar with a good selection of snacks and coffee/teas, all toiletries, very comfortable bed etc.  Bathroom had marble floors, a tub and a walk-in shower and rain shower.  You’re served three meals per day and provided with three course meals for lunch & dinner with a choice of Western, Thai or vegetarian (which you select the day prior — mixing and matching was permitted).  Overall the food was excellent with a variety of tasty options.  You’re…

11.review_text: My wife and I have just completed our ASQ Hotel quarantine in Bangkok at the Lancaster Hotel ASQ. Even though losing your freedom to move around for 15 days is obviously a difficult experience, I have to say that the Lancaster Hotel made it as best as it could be considering the situation. The General Manager and his Team are all delightful and they are very happy to help with any request at any time. In respect of the food choices you can get western, Thai or vegetarian options and there is a different menu every day of the week. The food arrives hot and I have to say it’s very tasty considering that it is obligatory in quarantine to serve the food in plastic and cardboard containers. I would recommend the Thai food as the tastiest option.There is plenty of food and I’m sure…

12.review_text: I have just completed my ASQ period for entry into Thailand and chose Lancaster Bangkok for this stay. The experience was faultless and despite the difficulties of being confined to a room for 15 days this hotel did everything possible to make the stay an enjoyable one.  Service, staff, facility and COVID controls brilliant, I would recommend this hotel for any type of stay Thanks to all the staff at Lancaster for taking care of me. Mark Anderson

13.review_text: With Lancaster Bangkok, we were able to get from stepping off the plane to resting in our hotel room within 90 minutes, door to door.   We were quarantined at the hotel for 16 days. During that period, every COVID-19 precautionary steps were taken by every staff member.  They are very strict, but also reasonable with our requests (e.g. additional bottled water, coffee, etc.). Once they know your routine and preferences, they do their best to anticipate them.  One thing we'd do differently is book the Apartment Suite, rather than Deluxe Suite.  Although they are the same price, and Deluxe Suite is 10 sqm larger and two full baths rather than 1.5 bats, the Apartment Suite offers a kitchen, and washer/dryer.  Handwashing for seven days is not fun; after the first negative test on…

14.review_text: Hotel is very good location and not far from subway station. Service is excellence front office, gym receptionist, housekeeping and restaurant service. Bed is very comfortable and gym is great space to burn

15.review_text: We were at Lancaster for our ASQ. Staff are well trained and very friendly. They performed their duties responsibly and efficiently, and very accomodating to our request. All in all it was good. The only thing we feel can be better is possibly to make the relaxing area by the poolside on the 12th floor, and not down on the ground floor by the side of the Hotel.

1.review_text: Excellent service, especially "Khun A" a shuttle driver has a highly service mind. Very polite and helpful. I really recommended this place to stay because so easy to travel around Bangkok (nearly BTS Asoke and MRT Sukhumvit) and you can walk around through many good restarants e.g. Carne, Big mama, etc. The hotel is very new and convenience like you stay at home. I've booked for Deluxe,one bedroom with king size bed that was soooo good.❤❤❤

2.review_text: Superb hotel located a few minutes walk from EmQuarter or Terminal21, the hotel shuttle will gladly take you there as well as its pleasant driver Prayong. We stayed in a perfect executive studio for a weekend or a week. The pool is top and clean we were only 2 in the pool it's very nice until 10am to enjoy the coolness on the roofs of Bangkok.

3.review_text: We stay one night here for our business in town.  The room is big and very clean with high quality facilities and services.  We really love the comfortable bed!!  We would highly recommend this hotel if you’re seeking for the quality room, nice location and reasonable price, they also provide shuttle to BTS and other nearby.

4.review_text: Awesome experience, great food! The room was spacious and clean. The staff were friendly. Great location with excellent dining around.Special thanks to Boss for the smooth check in and out. Will definitely come back.

5.review_text: K.JOB at the front give me an excellent service. The staff are friendly and helpful. Prompt reply and action from hotel staff. Hotel clean and nice decoration. Gotta good spot in the city. Easy to travel around

6.review_text: before I booked the room I has called the hotel and Mr.Job is the one who answer every questions. He’s very helpful and kind. And Mr.Job was also the one in the front desk to help me check-in. He’s really friendly. The service is excellent. And the place is not too far from MRT and BTS. The place also have shuttle bus too.

7.review_text: His name is Job. He was kind and polite. And the room was clean and satisfied. The hotel has a good location, so there are many places you can walk to. The swimming pool is not big  but well maintained

8.review_text: Great place for a business stay. Khun Job and Khun Boss are very professional and make every stay comfortable and easy.   I come here every week for business and conferences and this is the perfect place and the staff are all excellent. Thanks to all 🙏

9.review_text: The place is in a quiet area yet not too far from MRT underground train, great cafes and restaurants. The room features quality amenities, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, etc. The theme is airy white - the place is spotlessly clean. Amazing front desk, housekeeping staff. Swimming pool is great for morning/evening exercise & relaxation. Will stay again.

10.review_text: The best service resident that I had ever visited! Great design building! Uniquely!    Nice location on sukhumvit! It easily to find just follow the map. 🤣 Good quality breakfast materials!       Nice swimming pool! also sky garden there are cool space for working! Last review so thankful to khun boss and khun Job both guys such a good take care of us and the guy working at nightshift always keep smiling even though the night was so so late! 😃  So thank you again our stayed it was the best!

11.review_text: I stayed continuously at Somerset Maison Asoke from April - mid-July 2020 as I could not return to my country due to Covid pandemic. Over a long period such as this I will typically change hotel occasionally for variety but everything here was top notch so I didn’t see any reason to change. Room was very comfortable both for relaxing and remote working and included a functional kitchen for cooking simple meals. Housekeeping came daily to keep the room spotless and quickly adapted to my schedule. Yong and A were helpful whenever I had questions, needed documents printed and handling my extensions. And last (but not least) Job and Nadcha and others at security were always ready with a friendly greeting, politely screening any visitors and helping with Grab deliveries. Also,…

12.review_text: Excellent services, great condition, a very quiet place to enjoy my journey in Bangkok. And I think the price is worth it. People there are so friendly. I will probably choose it again when I travel in Bangkok next time.

13.review_text: They were super friendly. Good service. They always come on time to pick us up. Location is convenient and a great place to stay. It feel like coming back to our Bangkok home when we arrived at the lobby

14.review_text: The Somerest Maison Asoka Bangkok Hotel is very good. Me and my friend spent 8 days there. The Bellman team Mr.A,Boy,Det,Yong are very friendly, patient and careful. And front desk staffs Boss and John are also very professional. An interesting story happened when I left the hotel, I forgot my purse on lobby but the staff member found it and return to me. I really had a great time there and hope to come again XD

15.review_text: Somerset Maison Asoke Bangkok is always my first choice when choosing a hotel in Bangkok. It was my third time staying here, everything is great as usual. The hotel locates at Asok/Sukhumvit station which allows you to go everywhere without interchanging. Shuttle service is also provided even if the hotel is not far from stations at all. 7-11 is right beside the hotel so that you can grab food when needed. Most important of all, staffs here are really friendly and polite, esp the bellman team. Mr.A, Mr. boy, Mr. Det and MR. yong took really good care of their guests. Will be back soon! :-)

1.review_text: The higher up the rooms, the nicer the view in this hotel. The suite I had was comfortable and nicely designed. Good wifi. Friendly staff. Located amidst of many shopping centers. Great pool.  A place to come back.

2.review_text: Enjoy a five star hotel with super friendly staff and top notch services ! Appreciate direct connection to MBK mall and 7/11 shop located on ground floor : so handy ! Great bed and pillow quality as well as sound insulation ! We will come there again !

3.review_text: Good experience  Good sports facilities and pool Value for money. We are returning guest that speak a lot. Staffs are really well train and speak good English. Shower water pressure is slightly weak but temperature control is very consistent

4.review_text: We are newbie in thailand, after isolation, we'd like to reserve your hotel as the checkpoint for us to find new condo to stay. At the very first, i suppose your hotel is famous and has good credit hotel in BKK, thus i ask for the naive help to your staff for receiving my parcels during my stay. Via FB message, i thought it was the common way to send my request. While the first parcel your staff declines to receive, after i inquire AGAIN, they finally receive my parcel. Another 2 parcels, your staff asks me about the tracking number, i am so naive that to believe your staff woild take care, that quoted dialogue from your staff,  "Now, We have got only 1 parcel sir ,  May I have your reference parcel ID after that I will check from kerry for you."  I reply it is sent by flash express.  Your staff seemed to be very much busy, until i found 2 parcels were missing, your staff stated to try to fix it. Until i checked out, there are still one parcel lost.  I found that your hotel got problem on showing calling numer corrrectly (Which the wrong siuation is still ongoing), that is the reason the courier could not contact the front desk very well. And your staff, wants to rectify me that it was my main problem. Now once, even if i check out, your staff still insists that i am wrong. I am not asking your staff or your hotel to compensate my lost, but for the future if you could make it correct, might decrease the problem for sure.   As a guest, i feel insulted by telling your hotel the right thing. What if i am the technician of your hotel,it would still insult me my finding?  -  For the period without air conditioning. Your staff and related workers are trying to fix the supposed circumstances very hard, i admiire your hard work.  Also, your thoughtful idea to let guests live in other hotel, is very good measure. However, your staff changes the wording 4-5 times for the fixing time.  If we still stay the arranged hotel, in my opinion, no one would blame your hotel's management. But, when i go back to the hotel, nothing is healed, how does your hotel say? Finishing in midnight? Then turn to next day morning, then turn to befor 4 pm. What is the lesson of crisis management your hotel learn about? I am wondering to understand how it is the worst situation your hotel could kindly consider our sufferance.  Waiving for staying  one night?  That is the worst and exaggerated proposal I've ever heard. I am willing to pay your hotel for one night, and your hotel team could stay in the room without air conditioning.  How your hotel wants to pay me my suffered for one night free?  And when i ask your hotel if i could stay in the arranged hotel you send me for next 2 days, how your staff RECOMMENDS? if i knew your hotel had the issue on air conditioning during 8-9 Feb, i would not reserve your hotel. Doesn't your hotel want to make the extreme profit without caring about our feelings?  Apparently, your hotel does not care. It is lucky your hotel has guests during the pandemic. Somehow, your hotel does not treasure guests. -  No one is perfect, but not to pretend to be perfect.  Apology is not to make a room for conceiving yourself…

5.review_text: Excellent service, friendly staff, very clean and well located. The fitness club is very convenience for guests, also the MBK shopping centre were we can buy souvenirs, jewelry and food court. The pool and jacuzzi are amazing.

6.review_text: I recently stayed here with my friend Phirun. Rooms are nicely appointed, location is fantastic close to shopping and public transport. staff can not do enough to assist you. did not feel worried as covid protocals were followed. 10 out of 10

7.review_text: Well Organized from check in to check out. Safe atmosphere with rooms equipped with all required amenities. Helpful and cooperative staff specially Ms Asma. Easy access to malls and markets. Recommended for family and solo travelers.  Great Service...Thumbs up 👍🏻

8.review_text: I cannot tell you what a great stay I had. After working in casino management for more than ten years in Las Vegas, I appreciate excellent service and a clean hotel. And this is exactly what I received at the Pathumwan Princess Hotel in Bangkok.

9.review_text: The location was perfect as it close the center and also conveniently located near a good shopping district, The staff was so very nice and helpful, Always smiling and very friendly every time. I definitely recommend it!!

10.review_text: Exceptional hotel,that always feel like a home away from home. I always stay here when I am in Bangkok since 2012.  The Club Lounge facilities are excellent especially the Club Lounge managers who make every guest feel welcome and are happy to ensure all guests needs are met. Khun Pinyaporn as one of the Club Lounge managers in particular is very professional and greets all guests with a warm smile.  The rooms are excellent and of a high presentation and 10/10 for cleanliness. The location is very convenient in the heart of the city near many shopping centres and the BTS skytrain.   I have always enjoyed my stays at this hotel from the easy check in and booking process (Khun Niramon one of the assistant managers is very helpful and taking care of of my bookings), to the…

11.review_text: Being in customer service, in particular the travel and tourism industry, you deal with a lot of good and bad service. Human nature you're bound to complain about a bad experience over an excellent experience. In this case, Tee works as a Butler at the Pathumwan Princess Hotel and he is one of the most personable and experienced hotel staff I've ever come across! He takes care of important matters for the guests, spending time with each person to get to know them on a personal level and taking care of other guests needs all at the same time. My last visit to Bangkok was back in November 6-17, 2019 and cant wait to reunite and hopefully he will still be there. Koi is also a housekeeper on the executive floor usually on 14F, always request to have her working on the same floor as…

12.review_text: My Family and I really enjoyed the hotel As we have been visiting it for years. The hotel has an ideal location for tourists as the mall and the train station are walking distance.  The overall hygiene of the hotel is great, from fluffy bedsheets and pillows to absolutely fresh towels.   Not to mention the great hospitality of the staff members from doorman to concierge to room service. Ms. Asma at the front desk was a great great help, all the family loved her.   This hotel is HIGJLY RECOMMENDED!!! Would absolutely keep visiting.

13.review_text: Very clean hotel, friendly staff, convenient location close to Train connects and all shopping malls, excellent customer service from asma, very welcoming & excellent service! Luxury on a budget recommended 10/10👍 Thank you

14.review_text: This is a distinguished hotel that is the first preferred choice when visiting Bangkok, very clean and the staff is very nice, I highly recommend it, thank you Mrs. Asma in Public Relations for your great efforts!

15.review_text: Excellent service, very clean, great food, excellent location, very respectful and helpful staff. Stay for almost two months; we will comeback in about nine months and hope to stay in Pathumwan Princess Hotel again.

1.review_text: The GM named 'Mod' was so rude? How can they hire such a rude person to be GM? She should have watched her words. The other staffs were fine.  From my experience staying at 4-5 stars hotel, this hotel is still far from a 4 star-hotel. I'm positive the hotel claimed itself as 4-star hotel, not by accredited.  The room was too small. At the time I booked, they told me a room is 25 sqm, but I got the room that is less than 20 sqm when checked in. A staff told me I need to upgrade if I want a larger room.  Be minded the 5 stars reviews of this hotel though. Most of profiles only have a review for this hotel.

2.review_text: Good service from front office staff & bell boy. Hotel provide free shuttle to sky train station nearby. Pool is amazing view. Room is comfortable stay. Room rate is not expensive and not far from Central World and Platinum shopping mall

3.review_text: The beds are standard and are likely made for the average person, especially someone western sized (178 cm). We are an athletic couple and fit comfortably in their bed, also breakfast is a delicious rice soup and sausages, full resemblance to the advertised pictures, and utensils and tables are clean. Staff care is extremely helpful and goes above and beyond to communicate in english, especially “hello”. We reserved a room for our honeymoon and specified this in the reservation along with a large bed preference. We received everything we asked for. After we asked to switch the room we were moved immediately. After going to the front desk at 13:10 we were told that we have access to various amenities. Everyone was extremely polite and kept saying “Mr. or Mrs.”. Needless to say if you’re a foreigner, used to western quality and standards, stay here.…

4.review_text: The beds are non-standard and are likely made for malnourished tiny people, not somebody western sized (1.8m). We are an athletic couple and could barely fit in their bed, also breakfast is some kind of watery rice soup and sausages, no resemblance to the advertised pictures, and utensils and tables have food scraps from previous meals. Staff doesn’t care to help, is rude and doesn’t speak any english what so ever, not even “hello”.  We reserved a room for our honeymoon and specified this in the reservation along with a large bed preference. We received a small bed, with windows facing a loud construction site, 2 meters from the window. After we asked to switch the room we were told to wait for the next morning. In the morning we were told to wait until 13:00 for when the manager will arrive. After going to the front desk at 13:10 we were told that we waited in vain and the manager is at home, and if we want to switch, to pay double what we already paid.  Everyone was rude and kept saying “farang, farang”. Needless to say if you’re a foreigner, used to western quality and standards, don’t stay here.  …

5.review_text: We stayed 3D2N @ Vince Hotel in Feb 2020. This hotel was new and room was nice (we had a triple room), room size was good.  The breakfast was up till 11am which gave us ample time to eat. Selection was not bad too. There were many photo spots in the hotel. Nice decor.   The hotel also had a corner where you could try on the traditional Thai costume for free ... costume and all accessories included. The staff at this station were really nice and even refused to accept our tips.  The only issue we had was the location of the hotel. As we were all female group, it was inconvenient at night (there’s a stretch to walk back to hotel which was quite quiet and dark). But luckily they had a buggy transport service. But the transport service is only to certain point ... eg : Soi 15 ... so there’s still a stretch which we need to walk.  There’s no massage parlour within the hotel. But the buggy was able to drive us to the cluster of massage houses near Soi 15.  Overall ... nice hotel ... nice service ... if only the location is better 🤗…

6.review_text: We stayed Feb 2020, on a deluxe room, 3 adults 2 kids. Location: Siam and near Prathunam Its location is a little bit far from the main road, but they have a golf cart to bring you near the main road, 24/7.  It is not crowded and chaotic.  A very good location its near Big C ( a supermarket that opens til 2am), Siam Paragon (a high end shopping mall where the luxurious brands are house) and the MBK.  Its near Chatuchak market too as it took us a little 30mins going home.  Staff/s: Attentive and provide your needs.  Very good staff/s.  Food:  Breakfast is included in our room, and they served very good food.  As everyone’s observation, the room is too cold though!  Over all they deserves two thumbs up in the kitchen.  There is a transportation being offered by one of the travel…

7.review_text: We did reservation through booking.com, first time the hotel cancelled it because couldn’t process credit card. Second time they approved it and charged. After all we found that hotel charged the amount twice, but at booking.com it shows that reservation was cancelled for free. The hotel did double charge and refuse to refund money. Moreover, tried to charge third time on check-in, as they couldn’t find records of reservation.   Hotel do scam with credit cards, stay away from it.   Regarding living conditions there are much better hotels around for the same price.

8.review_text: This is the most valuable hotel in we have stayed in Thailand. we had after stayed in Thailand couple months. The only complaint we had is that the internet was pretty slow and we had to re-login often.  The service was good and the staff was very helpful. The room was nice and clean, comfortable, and not too loud even though it is in the middle of down town. Breakfast was better than other hotels we have stayed, and the public areas are comfortable.  You can tell the hotel put their heart into the business. It’s not super big but the design is thoughtful and considerate. I like the little details such as they give you 2 different colors of toothbrushes in the room. And offer big bottle of shampoo, lotion so there is less waste and better for the environment.   Close to business…

9.review_text: Firstly, I would be wary of all the 5 star reviews below as most of the contributors have only reviewed this hotel and nothing else, which seems fishy to me.   Saying that, this hotel is pleasant, great decor, free unlimited popcorn (although the cups could be bigger), the breakfast spread is amazing compared to what you get at other hotels, a 7/11 vending machine for anything you might have missed getting from the shop. The rooftop pool was a lovely place to chill after a day of shopping at the nearby Platinum Fashion Mall and the complimentary tuk tuk service is great.  The rooms are really nice too, great bed and comfy pillows. Although if they don’t spend money on keeping the rooms, I can see the rooms not looking as nice in the photos in a couple of years.   HOWEVER, if you…

10.review_text: Its wonderful to stay here. Room and breakfast are all good. Thai cloth experience is so good, too. Kik and Ploy helped us to take so many nice pictures. Let's us have so many sweet memories in Vince hotel.

11.review_text: we have stayed here for 5 nights everything is perfectly also the staff Nut very friendly and helpful he provides shuttle services from hotel  sent us to airport line the skyline to airport also provides popcorn for my children. i would like to big thank nut. i will come back next year. 🤟

12.review_text: thank you ms. Ben and ms.gift for good service and warm welcome the hotel is very nice .staff very friendly and helpful for us . We love to stay here  24免费接送 附近目的地 环境特别好 服务到位 有中文接待 有免费的水 等待时间短 地方比较好找 附近有多个商圈

13.review_text: We​ have​ stayed here​ for​ 5​ nights every​ting it​ perfactly the​ room it​ bigger and​ clean. The​ staff name​ Mr.nut very​ helpful and​ friendly also he provides welcomdink and​ popcorn 24​hrs. See​ you.soon

14.review_text: We have stayed here for 5 nights every night it perfectly also staff name nut very friendly and helpful. Hotel have popcorn and welcome dinks 24 hrs. Hotel very clean . It you need go to shopping center hotel provide buggy service.

15.review_text: Staff are very friendly. The location is not good at all- ugly and dirty street in the middle of nowhere. This hotel is for Chinese tourist mostly so breakfast is very special. Its 3+ star not 4 as i think. But thanks to the people working there anyway.

1.review_text: I have had the pleasure of staying at this hotel many times recently and for long periods due to Thai quarantine restrictions and have to say that All the staff make me feel so welcome and really genuinely care about making me feel valued and extremely comfortable.  A couple of weeks ago I mentioned that I loved the Thai style sticky rice desert sweets that I stumbled on in a local mall. last week and also this week the team specially made and  presented me with the delicacy.....what an amazing level of personal attention to provide to a guest.... Truly exceptional  ! This level of consideration and service for guests is so rare but extremely appreciated. Thank you so much to everyone at this hotel for another amazing stay 🙏

2.review_text: The grand Sheraton is an outstanding place to be for business and pleasure its an small paradise in the middle of Centre of Bangkok specially the amazing garden with pool and restaurant you think you are in a beautiful jungle,the gym and sauna are great .I have never seen an Hotelmangement team what was really interested in the well-being of the quest from breakfast till dinner .They have an amazing service level with you only can find in a few top hotels in the world. Thank you for your hospitality level .  Hugo ps

3.review_text: The Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit just makes you feel at home whenever you are not home. Great service, friendly employees, always clean, nice views, well located. Gym and Pool exceeded my expectations. I stayed two nights and had an amazing room. The staff really went above and beyond to make the night very special for me, especially during these difficult times. I highly recommend staying at this Hotel.

4.review_text: Been staying at this hotel twice and i would recommend you all to visit and stay. Excellent food at rossini's and a lovely service from the receptionist which i dont remember her name also big room even its just a deluxe room. Love everything here and i will surely visit again!

5.review_text: I have been hearing a lot of rave reviews of this place from other people and finally got to experience it first hand and i have got to admit it was excellent. It was HUGE and comfortable. Great rooms, great service and very helpful. Its a place full of charm and atmosphere. It is also perfectly located, right on Sukhumvit Road, next to the Sky Train. The pool area is very pleasant and one of the best. Most of all the staff are excellent: professional and friendly.

6.review_text: I've stayed at a huge number of Sheraton hotels across the various brands, in many countries and this is probably the best. The quality and service was exemplary. Loved every minute of the stay. The staff were very polite and helpful, their positive attitudes definitely is of great help during these uncertain times. Really enjoyed my meal at Rossini’s as well, exceptional food. The hotel also offered a wide range of facilities that made my stay really enjoyable. Will definitely be visiting this hotel again in the near future.

7.review_text: Honestly at first i was a bit hesitant to choose Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit Hotel because I have been reading an average reviews on social media platforms but I am happy that at last i chose this hotel for my staycation with my family. Take the advantage to experience a 5 star service at this hotel and you will not regret! They are offering quiet a great deals  with hotel credits + bonus points etc. which i feel is so good value for money. The service that you are getting and the money that you are paying is incomparable. Super recommended!

8.review_text: Staffs were friendly and service was amazing. Food at Rossini and Orchid Cafe were great too! Loved the pool as it got such a tropical vibes. Doesnt not feel like you are in the middle of the city.  Room was spacious and super clean. The view from the room was magical. Overall a 5 star experience. My family and I  had an amazing stay. Will surely re-visit if have a chance. Super recommended

9.review_text: We stayed 2 days at this hotel. It is very convenient to go around. You can just walk across to the mall. During my stay I was very impressed by the effort put in by staff members to help make my experience memorable. I love the butler services for Bonvoy member here. You can ask for drinks with free of charge 24 hours:)  The staff members were very helpful and patient with us.

10.review_text: Location : Located at Asoke junction. Very convenient, there is comnecting from BTS sky train.  Room : Large enought, equipped with luxury collection amenities. Gym, pool, restaurant - great.  Service : Very good.

11.review_text: Average Services.  This is my third stays since new year 2021  Location : - Good - Skytrain station is at your doorstep. You can get around Bangkok using train system easily. There are two big department stores or malls very close-by so you can find yourself easy access to shopping and foods/restaurants.   Check-in : - Average - I was not greeted as high tier loyalty program member like standard protocol "Thank you for being....(tier name)". On the 1st stay in late January and 2nd stay in mid-February, I was greeted with wrong tier name.  Room : - Good - Housekeeping has done good job keeping room nice and clean with two services daily (cleaning & turn-down). Room is a little dated and look retro.   Food Services: - Good - I went to the Living Room for lounge services. It quite…

12.review_text: I normally stay at a nice hotel to celebrate my birthday, but due to the travel restriction during a pandemic.  I have chosen this hotel to replace my first plan in Phuket. I booked the hotel with a government campaign "Travel Together" promotion directly to the hotel. As it was my first time applying for this promotion, I have called bothering asking so many questions. My experience with hotel reservations (Khun Oraya) was superb. She was so nice answering and assisting me in the booking process and payment as well as noted all my stay purpose and expectation.  I booked a promotional rate which include early check-in, and late check-out with 1000 THB hotel credit  - This is a great deal as I planned to spend most of the time in the hotel. I have arrived at the hotel very early…

13.review_text: The hotel’s location is great as it is connected to BTS Asoke station. Butler service was great. I was informed to use luxury room’s benefits either at the Living Room or Barsu. However, my first stay was turned away from Barsu as it was exclusively for private function even though front desk told me I had two options. As the promotion came out I booked my third stay and it remained the same. On my second stay, I even got a room on higher floor than my third stay. They put us in a room with three beds just for 2 persons. We were moved to another room and my friend can smell the painting. Are you serious??? Nothing wowed me. I feel much more personal touch at another Luxury Collection on Wireless Road.

14.review_text: This hotel is very very nice. At the beginning we booked three nights but after we extended 2 nights more. The hotel is very luxurious with a very good with a very delicious breakfast at the morning. The staff is great and we will back surely

15.review_text: Honestly, this hotel gives me beyond the expectation of a long stay experience. I have stayed here for 6 nights 7 days, booked a Grande room and got upgraded to Suite on the 2nd day onward for 5 nights, which gave me a specious wonderful place to work during the day.  ===People & Service=== This is definitely the selling point of SGS. The staff here are polite, friendly and welcoming, even from the email communication with the reservations manager. As a platinum member, we can enjoy the “luxury” benefit for having the butler service 24hrs, it’s really amazing and appreciated to have the free flow coffee (or soft drinks) delivering to your room anytime, we can even request to have a “coffee" morning call daily, it made my day every day!  One of the surprising things is that I met…

1.review_text: We've always been treat so well, the front manager and staffs are so nice and helpful. Stayed at our favorate suite and will be back on 7th April and thanks Swissotel. Food, beverages and breakfast was great and we like the japanese resturant was worth to try. At the moment rate is favorable for us to try different suites of hotel .

2.review_text: I love all facilities and foods here . Very impressed since i was there .... have got warm welcome from staff. Breakfast was nice also good time with buffet ( all u can eat ) long -fong  Especially spa that i so much love  good value good quality good service.

3.review_text: Thanks to K Ple and team, it is such a very impresive, exclusive and priviledged organize. All my guests are impressive of food presentation, service, taste, hospitality. It is very good value to money paid.  Very professional.

4.review_text: Spacious room. Awesome staff, they all were polite and helpful. Chinese Buffet was really worth the money. Breakfast was also good...so many varieties. Overall I give it a 10 out of 10. Will come back here again!

5.review_text: Very attentive staffs from doorman to checkin to restaurant team. Chinese food very good and super value-for-money. Breakfast is abit less of quality and detail of each dish. Room is comfortable but dated and tub is broken.

6.review_text: โรงแรมใหญ่ติดถนนรัชดา ไม่ไกลจาก MRT ร้านอาหารรอบๆก็เยอะ มี 7/11ติดกับโรงแรม ที่จอดรถใต้ดินไม่มีลิฟท์มาด้านบนแนะนำเอาของลงที่ด้านโรงแรม Bellboy บริการดียิ้มแย้มพร้อให้การช่วยเหลือเป็นอย่างดี  เช็คอินแล้วมีปัญหานิดหน่อยปัญหาที่1 bookingที่ 2 แผนกจองลงไว้อีกวัน แต่เป๋าตังค์ถูกต้องเช็คอินวันนี้ แต่ Front แก้ปัญหารวดเร็ว พร้อมเลือกแบบ Connecting Room ให้แบบ 2 เตียงได้2ห้อง สมาชิกAll ได้คูปอง Welcome ตามปกติ + Welcome Fruit  สภาพห้อง และ อุปกรณ์ต่างๆก็เพียบพร้อมตามมาตรฐานโรงแรม แต่ห้องน้ำไม่มีสายชำระ อาจไม่ถูกใจคนไทยสักเท่าไหร่   ปัญหาอย่างที่ 2 จองนวดไว้ตามแพคเกจโรงแรม แต่พอถึงเวลา นอกจากห้องนวดจะย้ายไปอยู่ชั้น 10 คีย์การ์ดไปชั้นนั้นไม่ได้ ถามจนท ให้ลงไปชั้น 5 ก็ไม่เจอคนมารับ เลยค่อนข้างงงกับระบบการจัดการ แถมนวดที่่จองไว้ก็ไม่มีในระบบ ทั้งๆที่จนท ขอข้อมูลและรับการจองไปหมดแล้ว แต่…

7.review_text: Strongly recommended if you're looking for a 5 stars hotel next to MRT line. The hotel is newly renovated. The room is very nice and spacious. Their Japanese restaurant "Takumi" is the best Japanese buffet in town. The services are excellent. I saw everyone are helping each other to provide the best services to customer. Don't miss to stay here.

8.review_text: Good location  near mrt , good service, worth the money ,staff so nice and helpful ,room was big and awesome clean and nice view , restaurant very tasty also breakfast not much choice but its really good and understandable

9.review_text: I really enjoyed the room at the swiss hotel. the breakfast was great as well. the rooms were spacious and everything seemed okay. One thing that stood out was that we were not greeted at the door. or the hotel did not have Valet parking or the greet at the car. so it was just a little confusing of what to do. we also had bags. so it was just a little difficult there.

10.review_text: Nice hotel with easy traffic link , huge place with various facilities , Most Important thing is great and nice services everywhere inside this hotel , very safe measurement during the COVICD19 special timing zone..

11.review_text: Highly recommended All staff here was very friendly and warmed welcome. The room was very clean, comfortable, and nice. The Chinese restaurant was highly appreciated both service and food. Although breakfast was bit busy, but easy to understand for the situation. Takumi was very delicious. Finally, I was exceedingly appreciated also recommended. Spacial thank for all staffs, especially, Khun Juthamas from Loong Fong, Khun Somchai and Khun Patcharaporn from Takumi.

12.review_text: You can stay here and go to any where very convenient because this hotel is in downtown such as Rama 9, Siam, Sukumvit, silom, etc. There is not far from underground. Youcan take the underground and continue with the sky train to anywhere in Bangkok.

13.review_text: Very clean room with very polite staffs. The toilets tiles are a little slippery but everything else is wonderful. Good location, very accessible and convenience. We had a great time and really enjoy our stay.

14.review_text: I have wedding ceremony on december 2020 Swissotel ratchada is good service and fantastic place for your vacation and ceremony event.  Swissotel ratchada team is support all time your requested.   Their Facility is completely have japan buffet, Fitness , pool.

15.review_text: I always prefer to stay at Swissotel Bangkok Ratchada. I’ve been there often due to the business works. I do have a lot of choices to choose to stay near the office, yet I still choose Swissotel because of Sales Nuk. She is always there to support me when I have any problems, whether hotels or personal, or whether how small it is. She takes care of every single points and every details. She knows and remembers what I like to drink, to eat, she always provide me the packages that she think will suit with me. I really appreciate what she has done for me. In my opinion, she is very energetic, motivated, and she is caring me, other customers and hotels like one of her family. Also, she is there to support me for 2 years, but her services never stop or decrease. I’m thankful for this…

1.review_text: I have been checking in at many Accor, SPG, and Hilton 3-4-5 star-rated  hotels for over 20 years.  I am writing this review on my second check in of this great hotel.   When comparing Mercure among its competition within the SAME CATEGORY, the Mercure Bangkok Siam reigns supreme.   Note: I find that some reviewers does a disservice to a hotel by unfairly judging a 4 star hotel with the standards of a 5 star premium hotel. This is like comparing a Honda Civic with a Mercedes. Let’s be real here folks.   5/5 for Location. Hotel is located right by a major BTS National Stadium which is one station away from Paragon Siam and CentralWorld, and is a short walk from MBK Mall with its plethora of shops and good eateries.   5/5 for gym and pool facilities. I am an avid swimmer and I can vouch the pool - albeit not the largest in Bangkok - is always kept clean and it’s a very decent size for swimmers doing laps. I don’t have a clue as to what some reviewers are saying about the pool being too small for swimming. This pool can easily accommodate 3-5 lap swimmers at the same time. I am at the hotel gym daily and have managed to work up a great sweat on the good cardio machines and the nice range of free weights each and every time. The gym is even equipped with a nice air purifier. What more can you possibly ask for in a gym and a pool from a hotel of its category!  5/5 for Suite room. The suite room - always clean and bright - which I am staying in has a separate living room area from the bedroom ensuite. Large windows in both areas showcase spectacular city views. The fridge is replenished every day with complimentary drinks.   4.5/5 for breakfast and lounge. Yes the pandemic has shrunk the number of visitors to Bangkok substantially and all hotels are doing their best to cut cost without compromising service. Mercure Siam has had to close its Lounge so I can’t really grade the lounge service while breakfast is mostly served a la carte with your choice of an American continental breakfast, some decent bakeries, Asian fried rice and chicken or pork congee. Maybe the bacon is a bit rubbery on a quite a few occasions, perhaps they can fry a smidge longer to give it that crunch.   5/5 great value for your money! Check around and you will see for yourself.   5/5 for service and hospitality. The exemplary service starts at the top from the hotel manager  to the housekeeping staff who all radiate a genuine concern for the well-being and comfort of the guests. This without exception is why as much as I like to be pampered at the 5 star premium hotels , am now a fan of the Mercure Bangkok Siam! …

2.review_text: Great location, just opposite to shopping area like MBK, Siam Center and only one station away from Siam Paragon. The overall atmosphere was good, room size is average but the quality of bed and pillows are good.

3.review_text: After check-out from iBis Riverside, my next stop is at Mercure Bangkok Siam.  The experience regarding service mind was uplifting.  Staffs are quite/super friendly. From check-in to check-out, everything went smooth.  Room is a bit small but nice. Desk for working, sofa for reclining, bed is so comfort.  View is very limited but could be compensated by great location for shopping at walking distance. BTS is just few steps away too.   Don't set expectation for pool as it's very small and not even good for swimming at all.   7-11 is on ground floor, very convenient.  Coffee at the bar was okay, not great, but at least on standard. Breakfast was limited, but good that I'm not a breakfast fan so no deduction for this.

4.review_text: I stayed at this hotel for second time. My room was good except hot water was not working. They offered me to change the room and upgraded me to higher type. However, Hot water still not working. I ordered room service for breakfast. Toast was overcooked and gone black. Gym , Pool was average seem no good maintenance.

5.review_text: - Nice service - Great location - Value for money - Very Best price - Well proper amenity - There is convenience store at ground floor, very convenience for guess. Easy to grab anything at standard price.

6.review_text: The hotel is located near a shopping mall such as MBK Center, Siam Discovery, Siam Center, and Siam Paragon, very convenient.  The room is a good size and housekeeping was on time to clean the room.   The front desk staffs were helpful. The breakfast had sufficient items and social distancing was applied.

7.review_text: My wife, daughter and I loved sleeping at this hotel. The room was spacious, quiet, clean and had a great view. The staff was also very attentive. We were however very disappointed by the breakfast. As an Accorplus Platinum member, I can easily confirm that choice-wise, this was the most limited breakfast that I have ever had in any Accor hotel. The coffee quality was also way below the usual Accor standard.

8.review_text: Hotel had newly reopened and had few guests. The staff are delightfully cheerful.  The BTS station is just outside and MBK shopping mall across the road.  Siam Square is an easy walk. Sleep quality is excellent and the bartender a mine of information.

9.review_text: Hotel is right next to BTS National Stadium station. Hotel building is same as Ibis hotel but different entrance, hence I got confuse at first. Proceed to lifts near convenience store.  Room is spacious and cozy with cute wall art.   Amenities include shower gel, shampoo, soap, coffee and tea making facility, glass bottled water and towels. Dental kit and slippers are provided upon request. There wasn't bathrobe.  From the hotel, MBK is just across of road, Siam station, Siam paragon, Siam discovery and many places are actually walking distance.  It was very relaxed stay and enjoyable stay.

10.review_text: for this COVID-19 period, the hotel still be open but booking was decreased. but this reason is not effect for service mind of staff. I appreciate hotel's staff , trying to provide any request in the limitation. I would like to say thank you for all staff .

11.review_text: I really enjoyed my stay at Mercure Bangkok Siam Hotel for the past week.  There is a 7-Eleven on the ground floor that is open for 24 hours and 7 days a week.  It is closest to the top shopping malls in Bangkok (MBK and Siam Paragon).  It is near a McDonald’s.  The staff at the hotel and 7-Eleven were very friendly.  The room was very comfortable.  I recommend staying at this hotel in Bangkok 👍

12.review_text: The location is in the center and close to the siam mall. You can reach all touristic and non tourist area within 30 min.  The receptionist Oin and Tina are great receptionist  and guest service was great, always smiling and available. Well done continue like this.

13.review_text: This is the second time that my family stays with Mercure Bangkok Siam. They still impress us a lot with a good service, room, and staff. The room is very clean and beautiful. (I do attach pictures of the hotel room and the city view from the room.) The service from the staff is great. I checked in on March 5, around 3 PM. The reception staff gave us clear info about their service and the benefits that we will receive. They talked to us kindly and gently which my family was impressed a lot. Their maid is also polite and did a great job! I recommend this hotel for people who want to relax and find a hotel near BTS station. Thumbs up!  - Pitchawee

14.review_text: It was a night staying at this hotel for me to relax & re-energize a little before a week filled with hectic business schedules. It was absolutely a wise decision! Just like my past experiences staying at Mercure Bangkok Siam that filled with many fond memories, the services by Mercure Bangkok Siam staff was exceptional.   The guest relation team such as Mai, May, Jam and Fon are friendly and attentive. They seem to remember I have stayed in before and make every possible way to elevate my experience as a valued guest. Also kudos to the house-keeping team in maintaining the room fresh and comfortable. For those who need a quiet, restful night stay in Bangkok downtown center, this is the right hotel for you besides it's conveniently located next to BTS station and major tourist…

15.review_text: I have stayed for a month this time.  The staff members were professional and courteous.  Housekeeping staffs were wonderful.  I think there were two different teams of people who cleaned my room.  One of the team is very thoughtful.  They knew I am a heavy water drinker and always gave me enough bottles of water so I won't have to call the front desk to ask more.  I have booked  my stay through Accord app and extended my stay about four times.  One of the time I had not idea why that when I clicked breakfast included, it ended up without breakfast.  Because I had used my membership points so I could not cancel and rebook it.  It would have been very helpful for the app to allow me making amendments regardless if using my membership points.  Anyway, the hotel Manager was kind…

1.review_text: Very pleasant hotel. Very efficient welcome and service. Perfect location on Sukhumvit for shopping ... Absolutely beautiful, spacious and well equipped rooms. Amazing breakfast buffet. Pleasant swimming pool. Absolutely magical roof top for a drink at night.

2.review_text: This is a very nice hotel in the Thonglor Area. The service is excellent as well as the rooms. The food is good with the famous District restaurant and 57th Street restaurant in the Lobby area.  The Food and Beverage Director Ismael is terrific as is his wonderful team.  The Front office is manned by Paul the best Front Office Manager in Bangkok.  The Director of Rooms is headed by Steven who has a great team.

3.review_text: I booked this property on two different weeks for a one day Work-From-Hotel. Booking this was a bit of a nightmare. First long silence with no response and then very confusing messages.  Finally, I received the correct package which includes 9hrs of stay as well as a set lunch (three courses).  The room size varies quite a bit, one room was very big with a wide-open bathroom and the other one was much smaller with a different layout. The floor is white marble so quite cold. In the 2nd, smaller, room, the desk size was not really sufficient to work comfortably.  What I disliked was the appearance of disorganization when it come to the 57 Restaurant. We were given a Titanium letter upon check-in only to be told that the staff needed to check eligibility. The lounge is still closed for renovations so part of 57 is dedicated for lounge use. After about 20 minutes of waiting staff came around to tell us that we were not entitled to get the afternoon tea.
