When I referred them to the benefit letter, I was a) told that this was a mistake but that they would honor the offer and b) ... and this is where it gets crazy, that they had actually discontinued the afternoon tea. So, all of the hassle for one latte and one cup of tea ... not happy!…

4.review_text: Hotel is great, price is not expensive. Food is good taste and service from front office, food beverage and housekeeping. Promotion is attractive and very happy during stay. room is nice with round bathtub

5.review_text: The staff here are outstanding, I talked to Puri and she answered all of my questions excellently, and helped me resolve a small issue I was having due to travel delays, I really appreciate all her effort!!! Looking forward to my stay here, and will be a repeat customer!

6.review_text: This is a 5 star hotel at currently 3 star rates .A large very high hotel with all the facilities that you would expect .The room was beautiful and the round bath a first for me ,which from a high floor you can gaze out over Bangkok .we didn’t do Breakfast but cocktails at their rooftop -I think 48th floor -were memorable although high may be great you can have too much of a good thing .Staff were good although reception ,I think I had  a rather snotty little manager who was showing one of his staff how to do it ,he didn’t like my Thai driving license ,one which I have used all over Thailand both high and low without problem .Allin all great and we will definitely go back

7.review_text: Superb service with well trained and polite staff. The room is spacious, clean, fresh and equipped with all basic necessities, especially thann aromatic wood bath amentities which I fall in love with. The bed is so luxuriously soft. The octave restaurant is a must-see for your eyes. In conclusion, there is nothing negative about this hotel. Come and experience for yourself.

8.review_text: I’ve been here to celebrate my girlfriend’s birthday with her family an it was very amazing.  Reservation was great, they were very detail about the promotion and i got a high floor room as i requested :)  Concierge was brilliant and helpful even i went after midnight.  Surprised birthday cake in a room was perfect!  and Octave bar was the best, too!!  #petite_nada

9.review_text: overall very beautiful hotel and breakfast is great. Staff is also very good.  however, there is too much random construction noise inside the hotel. I expect better of a 5 star hotel using the Marriott brand.

10.review_text: The services received from the hotel made my staycation a memorable one. ❤  I had a dinner at the District. All the staffs were so kind. They are willing to answer all the questions we had and gave us all the useful information.

11.review_text: I found this hotel is really the standard hotel, nothing to remember comparing to other hotels that I have been.  Food: very generic like other hotels. Nothing go above and beyond. If you find perfect place for dining, this hotel is not a choice. Food is not bad, just for a sake of eating with over-price. No varieties. Not worth spending.   Guest room: clean and spacious but with many dust in the room. Amenities are extremely limited. We have to request for slippers, body lotion, cotton buds, shaving kits, drinking water only 2 bottles. I know that hotel has to save cost but it is worth enough to lose your reputation by saving cost on body lotion, cotton buds and slippers? Only one good thing is big bathtub.  All in all, nothing memorable, just sleep, eat and go.

12.review_text: This is first hotel that I stay for this year, I selected this hotel as I loved room design and big bathtub inside bathroom, the bed also very comfortable.  Special thank you Khun Noey from reception to take care my reservation and also make my requested for the room.  One more thing about bath amenities, if the hotel can setup full options it might better as my room don’t have body lotion and soap.

13.review_text: We stayed with Marriot during the holidays including New years eve. Travelling in uncertain times,  Marriott sukhumvit has felt like a safe home to us. We also had dinner buffet at 71th which was excellent with great staff, food, ambiance and live music entertainment. Our buffet dinner inluded a invitation to the Octave Rooftop bar to celebrate New Years Eve. Overall we really enjoyed our stay. Thank you Marriott Sukhumvit for making our stay a memorable experience.

14.review_text: We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights over the Christmas holidays. The rooms are modern,very clean, and the beds are so comfortable. We really enjoyed the buffet breakfast in the mornings, which in my opinion is one of the best in Bangkok.

15.review_text: Our amazing stay started with Paul from front office. He was not only very helpful, he also made sure that we will enjoy the rest of our stay. Upgrading to the Executive Lounge was all worth it. Although you won’t be getting the usual exclusive service as you are sharing the lobby with the rest of the guests, the  menu offered definitely made up for it. Special mention to Polly from executive lounge and Lew from breakfast for anticipating our needs. Also, the chocolate present from checkout was a nice thoughtful touch.

1.review_text: We were just. a day in this awesome hotel.we got very good deal due to covid. The staff very helpful and very professional. Highly recommend this hotel located in the center of everything.  Nice temple near the hotel seems to be popular in that area.

2.review_text: I guess when the hotel discounts the room 60% you should expect the royal treatment.  The room was fine for $850 baht - but somehow I think they skimped a little especially considering no one was in the hotel due to COVID and they could have done a lot better.  If that room and the amenities are typically $3000 - that is definitely not worth it.  Not like its on a beach or something.  Staff are not empowered to improve the situation due to company rules.

3.review_text: It's good hotel, located near MRT, shopping mall (Sam Yarn Mirttown). The staff are very good, very welcome. I love Khao Tom Buffet at Kualuang restaurant. The staff at restaurant are very serviced mind as well.

4.review_text: The room is so clean and clear. I would like to say I really like your kindly staff, they're be enthusiastic. The position of this hotel is great, it's near samyan mitrtown and Chulalongkorn University. And easy to access the hotel bc art (public transport) is nearby.

5.review_text: It is in a good location to travel to the popular places. The staff are polite and helpful. The room is clean and the bed is comfortable. The toilet is automatic with the strong water. Highly recommended to stay at this hotel.

6.review_text: This was my fifth stay at Mandarin Hotel.  Each stay was excellent.  The staff is always very attentive to their guests.  On one stay, I arranged for an early checkout that was before the normal breakfast time.  The front-desk staff, on their initiative, arranged for box-breakfast for myself and my family!  That is the type of great service that you will receive at the Mandarin Hotel.

7.review_text: This hotel was very elegant and clean. Rooms were very clean, beds were comfortable and service was great. Buffet food in the mornings was Awesome! We ate there everyday before going out on our tours. Location was good, you could walk to the big shopping mall about 10 min

8.review_text: Personal is very kind and helpfull at 360 degrees. Location is central and perfect. The Hotel is exacty what on the pictures and what expected. Thank you Mandarin Hotel by Centre Point. I suggest this Hotel for business stay and for family stay. The swimming pool is very clean and the rooms too.

9.review_text: although near mrt samyan, still need sometime to walk and transfer to bts. most attractions are at bts line so transfer will be needed. breakfast by hotel and room is not bad. feels like hotel room price on the higher side than others

10.review_text: I am very please by my staying in Mandarin Hotel. Staff is professional and friendly,  food delicious, silent room, perfect set of utilities, good location not far from MRT station and some big shopping mall.

11.review_text: I lead an incentive group last December 2020. I have a good experience with this hotel such as good hospitality, big room size, complimentary mini bar on 1st night and good breakfast restaurant.  Thank you

12.review_text: Very pleasant surprise, they seem to have taken guest experience from start to finish very seriously and spent time designing it to be pleasing. I drove in to the hotel and the security guards in the parking lot (both male and female) were very attractive- I mean model level beautiful.   Check in was a breeze.  The alcohol-free minibar was totally free/complimentary which is one of those little things that come as a pleasant surprise in contrast to most other hotels who try to overcharge for items in the minibar.  The room was just fine. Spacious and comfortable. Water pressure and temperature of the shower were good, strong and hot.  Room service food is good too, although due to the COVID outbreak their hours are limited. The breakfast was better than other hotels but not…

13.review_text: The staff were friendly and welcoming. The room was very comfortable and clean. It is in a good location with the main areas all within a 15 minute walk or just a five minute taxi ride. I’ll be back!!

14.review_text: Our stay here was an absolute delight. The room was spacious and immaculate. The staff were welcoming and incredibly helpful. It has a good-sized swimming pool, plus a gym and spa facilities at really good prices (sadly closed when we were there due to coronavirus). I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel. Please be aware though that the hotel is alcohol-free.

15.review_text: Excellent hotel with good value for money. One of the best breakfasts I remember: the best way to start a tourist day in Bangkok Very convenient the metro station a few steps from the hotel. The hotel booked us a great car at a very good price to get to the airport.

1.review_text: Excellent service from staff. Room was nice with elegant decoration. However, breakfast was poor both of quality and quantity. Very disappointed! Not recommended if you want to have an experience in ultra luxury hotel.

2.review_text: I have been here twice. I love all the details inside the room (first time: the deluxe room, second time: the manor suite). The room styles are great and each has its own icing on the cake. You need to stay there to feel it yourself. Plus, if you love arts, they are all around the hotel.  Services were top-notch, even though they felt a bit drop when there were many guests around. The hotel staffs were friendly and helpful. There were problems during my first stay with the window cleaning on Sunday morning, but they were sorted out nicely. Housekeeping was very into the details. I love how they turned down the room at night. They tied my charging cables and put sweets in the bedroom.   Breakfast was really great. It's an ala carte buffet. I love the coffee drip V60, scrumble eggs, and waffles. Sadly, there were not many selections on the menu.  Don't miss a Peking duck at Nan-Bei. It's different from others but it's great. I also tried Pot Sticker and Teas. They're all wonderful. However, don't order the set menu; as my first time there, I got a dinner set menu come together with a room rate and it didn't taste good.  Lastly, it would be great to have an iron and more plugs with a working desk in the room.  Will return again in the future.…

3.review_text: Due to promotion offers this period with many 5 star luxury hotel, i have an opportunity to staycation at Rosewood Bangkok that so impressed and memorable. Moreover i would be back to visit again and again.  All staff start from the process of check in until check out. Rosewood Staff are warm welcomed and service-minded treated us with personalized attention.  Rosewood Bangkok is located in prime location. Easy access connect to BTS skytrain “Ploenchit Station” exit 1.  Elevator for guest in house separate from outside guest who is come to dine at hotel’s restaurant. That is great for privacy.  My room is Premier Suite that as one bed-room suite, separate living room and bed room. Room is contemporary residential design, living space and feature bespoke furnishing in a warm and neutral palette.  The stunning city view 180 from bedroom so memorable.  Dyson Hairdryer so trendy. Luxury living with special bath amenity.  Lakorn European Brasserie is a place for Breakfast in Chic ambiance. Breakfast as A la carte. Quality ingredients and great taste. Nice presentation. So don’t miss it for post in social media IG. My favorite is Belgian Waffles.  Signature Chinese Restaurant “Nan Bei” is recommend.  Due to the social distancing regulations, Pool must be booked prior to usage.  Lastly, after check out i would like to said that i would not back home, i need to stay more and more.  Special Staff that would mentioned for my stay is “Osmond Cheng” his service were top-notch. He is our Butler. Best Butler when compare with competitor hotel that has this kind of service as Waldorf or St.Regis. …

4.review_text: We decided to stay at Rosewood as part of a birthday celebration that we were invited to and thought we would make the weekend extra special by treating ourselves with an easy access Grand hotel breakfast. Rosewood staff and experience exceeded our expectations by far with impeccable service and product quality. Also, imagine, we could order our breakfast to our room till 2pm! And it was truly perfectly served. We also tried the spa as a last Sunday treat and it was one of the best massage experiences we ever had. Felt like we were floating on those heated, soft massage beds... Recommended!

5.review_text: Service is good , bed is comfortable, food is 4,5/5 , NAN BEI is amazing . Lobby is nice. The corridor is nicely decorated, little bit London style . I am sorry , i will post photo just of defect . Its my personal opinion . Lovely rooms and interior but on the photo only!it looks little bit different in real because designer use cheap materials for furniture, strange floors material, have feeling that is not real wood (in an expensive room) .we were visited for show the rooms below the category and its  surprisedly more    logical and beautiful. Window in our suit was dirty .The breakfast - thai restaurant is very incomprehensible. Wrong colour sofas, no scenery, No decor, not enough greens and you dosnt feel WOW . The pool is located in a catastrophically ungood place. In the shade ,under the tones of iron and metal. It's impossible to sunbathe. The water is cold. SPA. Reception table in the same room as guest waiting for therapy,its 1 metre between table with computer and lot of paper, so you feel working mood more than relax . It's not a spa, it's just massage rooms. Because no rest area, no sauna. No feet bath. Therapists' level is 3/5. Nothing is prepared for relaxation in the room except music ..There are candles, but no one use them..so you save it for who?  I just feel in 2021 hotels should use really good material and landscape design to be on the TOP, otherwise its will go down and down ..…

6.review_text: Booked the premier suit room for staycation in Bangkok. The room was beautifully decorated. I love the attention to detail. The corner room provided Bangkok’s business building view which is what we expected given the location of the hotel.   Good amenities provided in the bathroom. Bath tub is rather small in my opinion and it was different from what we saw on the web site. Our room #1312  The hotel was a short walk away to BTS sky train system with a dedicated pathway to it. Very convenient.   The hotel itself is short walk away from high end shopping mall, The Embassy.  Service was good all the way from front desk to concierge.   Breakfast selection is a bit limited as due to social distancing we have to order a la carte. The bread provided was on the cold side. The food…

7.review_text: I selected this hotel for celebration of our 1st Anniversary. Rosewood is 1 of the best and well-know hotel for its venues e.g. Lennon's and Nan Bei. Unfortunately, this time we were not able to enjoy the stylish bar as we wish due to the COVID-19 Situation in Bangkok and protocols from government. Anyhow, it was a great chance for us too that we can use "We travel together" which is the project from government to stimulate Thai's tourism and hospitality. So, with this, we decided to choose Rosewood as our destination.   Hotel offers "Staycation" with free upgrade and breakfast included for incredibly good price. This time we stay for 1 night and get the executive room.  Checked in:  We arrived at 10:30am.  We need to take elevator to 7th floor which the lobby located.…

8.review_text: Very comfortable during stay .   All staff is excellent with service mind.  In room is decorated with luxury modern style   Hotel is close to department store and have connect to BTS & SKY walk that most convenience.  Taste of food also awesome.

9.review_text: Hotel = good Service = great But in room dining = cold food, packaging for leftovers is very low cost just brown simple boxes i am very disappointed Jacuzzi water = allergic and I never ever have allergy to water

10.review_text: I choose to stay here due to the location and have read review before. This hotel is very impressive with nicely staffs my executive room is very clean and sleep well. Location is  at the central of BKK next to bts Plearnjit station  about 5 min walk. you can go to central world by sky train or walking.

11.review_text: Very great view in room and nice reception  Breakfast and bakery are very good and delicious  So comfy and relaxing  Around hotel has many place to travel You can have breakfast in room or restaurant, can early check in and late check out on this period

12.review_text: the staffs are very professional and friendly since the arrival, maybe it’s still new, so you can feel the energic from the hotel itself and people.  The staycation package includes breakfast and set dinner in the Nanbei restaurant and late check out until 6PM, after Thailand Travel together, only 3900B was paid by us.   ==Room== The room is nice designed, both bedroom and bathroom are having the floor to ceiling window, so you can enjoy the nice skyview while having the hot bath, by the way, the bathtub size is big and deep enough for your full body to be soaked. One thing to highlight, Rosewood provides the most expensive Dyson hair dryer, which is very fancy and fast to get dried, wish I could have one in my condo lol. I love the mattress which is perfect, not too soft not to…

13.review_text: Great service since check-in until check-out.  Excellence room design and very clean, good view and very privacy. Room service have a service mind. Service in Nan Pei restaurant give a new experience. Location of hotel is link to sky train, convenient to travel.

14.review_text: I love everything of this hotel. The guest room is decorated beautifully. In room breakfast is pretty good. Khun Kapook and Khun Jeff are very good service, attentive throughout the stay. (personal butler)

15.review_text: We had a very enjoyable time during our stay in Rosewood Bangkok. The room is very nice and clean, equipped with all new features and view of Bangkok city. Breakfast was exceptional. Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful!

1.review_text: Our second stay at this hotel which is the best recommendation! Our room was comfortable. Breakfast good, but choice restricted due to Covid. Although many other hotels in the area it appears to have a loyal following.

2.review_text: Everything perfect good stay and short time to stay but okay nice view city centre of Bangkok. Service great the price valued will be back again thank you for everyone good welcoming excellent take the guest

3.review_text: got off to a bad start i did not book for myself, so no member benefits, or qualifying nights/points even though i recommended Accor to the agents who booked ? something maybe Accor could look at.  the staff at the Bar / Restaurant deserve a special mention, they were excellent, friendly, approachable and went out of their way to make it a welcoming atmosphere.

4.review_text: Amazing views, good breakfast, good gym, good food and excellent service.   My room was on the 19th floor, excellent toiletries, excellent views, comfortable bed.  The room has everything you need, mini bar, air con, kettle with coffee and tea, hairdryer, bathrobe, toiletries and much more.   The hotel has a great swimming pool with great views, and there is also room service.   The rooftop bar upstairs names Sky 20 on the 26th floor is surreal. The bar views are spectacular and the music is great but you need to call and reserve a table due to it being open to non hotel guests too.   Location of hotel is superb and there are always taxis available.   Overall, good hotel at a reasonable price.   Highly recommend.

5.review_text: Everything was great, comfortable check in and room very clean. we got upgrade to executive deluxe room it on 24th floor was a nice view. And dinner at sky on 20 it was a nice dinner very delicious. Thank you all staff for excellent take care

6.review_text: Slight mix up at check in over the sky bar but the staff put that right and gave us not only complimentary drinks but a late check out. Sign of a good Hotel when they correct things. Impressed by the very nice lighting throughout the hotel and lovely dining area. Many thanks to Khun Yoksuwan for his help and hospitality. Exceptional staff

7.review_text: We had great experience for function room and accommodation. Khun Ornprapha Assistant Director of Event provided professional service, gave information for function room immediately. Function room is good size , clean and well organize. The banquet staffs are helpful and provided good service with friendly manner. Front desk staffs and service center are efficiency service, we had some couple requested during stay and they brought them up right away. Food was good quality especially buffet lunch. This hotel will be the first priority to visit and for any special occasion in the future.

8.review_text: thank you for early check in with good room for me. also your staff's quick service recovery was nice. i will book novotel 20 for my next vacation already, hope to see you very soon. thank you very much.

9.review_text: I stay here for celebration 10th Wedding Anniversary.Upon checkin, I had to ask about Credit,benefits and make sure everything by myself. Upon stay TV no signal, Engineer came to fix but seems no service mind.

10.review_text: Beautiful rooftop where you can have some drinks and watch sunset. Huge selection at breakfast. Pool area was really nice, and so was the gym. The room was really modern with a great view of the city.

11.review_text: Nice location staff very professional room clean breakfast is good hours keeper is very helpful shuttle is ready all the time I love it  sky restaurant are very beautiful and peace of mind I recommend this hotel to all my free

12.review_text: To begin with I was quite looking forward to stay at this hotel , however at the checkout there was a piece of paper on the desk informing guests that the sky bar would be closed for a private party and also the pool and pool bar areas. It would have been nice to know about this in advance , I would have chosen a different night to stay ( although on checkout the same info was being given for the night ahead) Seems rather inconsiderate if the hotel to to give any advance warning. Other than that the hotel was fine , just a normal business hotel in the city.

13.review_text: We were disappointed with the service here except for Khun Tae who was very polite with good manners and the only person who treated us properly. Khun Tae was very professional and pleasant all the time. We don’t plan on coming back.

14.review_text: I stayed here for 4 nights with my wife and daughter. We had really good time. We all love the bed, so comfortable. Place is sparkling clean. Staff are more than 5 stars qualified. We will surely come back to stay here again when we will travel to Bangkok.

15.review_text: Excellent hospitality, breakfast spread, clean and good. Except for the water splashing sound regularly in the room I stayed. Probably some drain water line need acoustic. Location of the property is good closer to all requirements

1.review_text: An Amazing Staycation with a great atmosphere and highest safety - SHA Certificate from Thailand's Safety & Health Administration.  Oriental Residence Bangkok Wireless Road, a fantastic location in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping and embassy district.  You can go to nearby attractions, such as Central Embassy, Central Chidlom, Siam Paragon and Sea Life Ocean World, and the BTS Skytrain at Ploenjit and Chidlom stations.   This Luxury Service Residence is an oasis amidst the hectic lifestyle of Bangkok.     We stayed in a two-bedroom suite (120 Sqm).  The big room features full facilities and lots of free space.  It's very comfy for a family of 4 people.  A full kitchen area with all kitchenware is ready for your in-room cooking with a dining table, microwave, coffee machine, toaster,  electric stove, etc.  The living room area has a big TV and a nice balcony with a fabulous Bangkok city view! Two bathrooms are available, one in the main bedroom that boasts a king-size bed, TV, working desk, and big bathroom with a full bath and another bedroom next to the living room, the second bedroom has a double bed and TV separate and bathroom. This Two bedroom suite is so comfortable! We really relaxed and chilled in our big room.    For lunch and dinner, Cafe Claire has a value set lunch 3 courses starting at 490 THB only - the food is wonderful!   I love the Japanese Pumpkin soup with whipped sour cream and topped with crispy bacon; the taste of sweet pumpkin and bacon is accented by tangy sour cream - so yummy!  I recommended the Striploin steak served with fresh vegetables.  Simple and scrumptious fare!  I wrapped up my meal with a dessert of Caramel Flan and Caramel custard with a good cup of coffee!   The Dinner features 4 courses for 800 THB per person.     For starters, we recommend the Caesar salad, the salad dressing is so tasty!   Two soup choices and both are delicious; Japanese pumpkin soup that we just had for our lunch or clear vegetable soup with herb infusion.  We recommend the Thai Angus beef tenderloin served with baby vegetables; this prime cut of beef is cooked perfectly and is tender absolutely delectable!     Another main dish you should try is the Snow fish served with organic green beans. The fish's tender taste is mild and delicious!   End up your meal with a nice dessert homemade ice cream for selection and Oriental Mille-Feuille with Vanilla ice cream.  Thaifoodies really enjoyed our time at Oriental residences Bangkok Wireless road!     In the morning, we walked around the hotel we went to the swimming pool and fitness center on the 4th floor (If you want to use fitness and swimming pool) You have to make a reservation with the front office in advance during this COVID 19 situation) After we walked around we have a great a la carte buffet breakfast which is served in Cafe Claire.   Over 20 different dishes are available on the breakfast menu.  In the International food category; Two eggs served with sausage, ham, hash brown, mushroom, and asparagus with roasted tomato and red beans.   They also have a healthy egg white omelet, avocado, roasted tomato, spinach, smoked salmon, and sour cream, and you can also choose many kinds of eggs, made to order! (They also have a side dish for your selection add more 170 THB per one (Crispy bacon, Hash browns, Sauté sausage, Grilled asparagus, Fresh Salad, Roasted tomato, and sautéed mushroom) I love sautéed mushroom and asparagus it's perfect to go with egg!   Asian Favorites; We try Shrimp wonton soup with bbq pork; Wonton has a good taste of shrimp with sesame oil, soup is mild and tasty, and another dish we tried was the prawn fried rice the fried rice is flavor full or you can have a choice of chicken fried rice instead.   A must try Sweet temptation category; Every sweet menu is all interesting!   Belgian waffles served with peanut butter, maple syrup, and vanilla ice cream.   ฺีButtermilk Pancakes   Brioche French toast: THIS MENU IS A MUST TO TRY the fluffy soft and yummy brioche flour French toast ever! Top with warm caramel and berry fruits   Mix Homemade bread in a basket: Croissant, Muffin, and chocolate pie pastry, and more are all good to try!   Fresh coconut juice, Fresh coffee is ready to serve!   We had a good time with friends in this excellent Oriental Residences Bangkok. Another place we highly recommend.  …

2.review_text: A high quality hotel both in terms of the rooms, common areas, staff and facilities. We had a large corner one bedroom suite which provided comfortable and luxurious accommodation. The hotel is at an excellent location. The room rate was very competitive and included breakfast from a comprehensive a la carte menu (this replaced the standard buffet because of Covid considerations. The property also has a high class, formal Western restaurant with a Michelin star. We did not try this restaurant but a "foodie" friend who lives in Bangkok told us that it was an excellent restaurant. The gym is not large but it has a good selection of machines which all appeared to be quite new and were well maintained. All staff were friendly, efficient and proactively ready to help. We will certainly stay at this property again. …

3.review_text: Really central location on wireless rd and near ploenchit. Staff is very responsive, attentive and flexible which during corona is really appreciated. Clean hotel with good safety and hands cleanser available.

4.review_text: We went to this place right before shutdown so I don’t know if that affected food. It was average for Thai food. Not quality like on East and West Coast. The service was good and they were very concerned about cleanliness which was appreciated.

5.review_text: I had really looked forward to my one night test but was quickly dissapointed, staff was great on arrival but, honestly there is no soul here room service spoke little English I ordered a pot of green tea but got green tea ice cream 🤣 Apartment furnished looks good on pictures but cheap and could use a touch of care Breakfast was ok ... there is nothing 5 Star about this exsperiance lots of better places for the same money.

6.review_text: Stayed here for the month of February, staff was excellent, kudos to Nadine, Lucky, and Victor.  Special mention to the General Manager Mr. Martijn Zengerink.  Great property, great location!! Shuttle service was a real plus getting us to the BTS.

7.review_text: Thought that we’d try this delightful hotel/residence and were not disappointed. Ideally situated in the CBD, close to excellent shopping malls like The Embassy Mall.  We received a warm welcome on arrival and checked in without any hassle. We booked a Junior Suite, which I’d guess is their equivalent to a deluxe room.  The room was more than adequate for our needs and even had a kitchenette with hob, microwave, fridge etc.  The bed was comfortable, but the pillows did not suit us being too soft, I felt like I was wearing earmuffs! There was a pillow menu but really? Who could be bothered on a one night stay. The bathroom was lovely and had all the amenities we needed.  We also used the complimentary shuttle to the Embassy Mall.  We had dinner at the hotel in Cafe Claire. The…

8.review_text: A highly well maintained, elegant place to stay in the center of Bangkok. The staff were extremely attentive and the location is central for Lumphini park and big shopping centres, however slightly set apart from the main drag, making the walk to and from Siam Square slightly further. Also, as someone who enjoys experiencing local culture and food, the area doesn’t offer much colour beyond shopping malls, overpriced bars and restaurants.

9.review_text: I want to thank the hotel staff for upgrading our suite and giving us a suite with a view to the park. Also thank you for the chocolate plate that was in the fridge for my husband's birthday. Thanks again to the staff at the reception, who welcomed us nicely and gave us a great treat even while we did the check in Great hotel, great service, great atmosphere, clean and comfortable in a great location

10.review_text: Oriental residence Bangkok , We were perfectly placed for meeting are Thai friends and going to all our familiar restaurants and venues.  It is particularly well placed for the sky train and forgetting to and from the international airport very close to a lot of the embassies an excellent area.

11.review_text: Good location. Walking distance to the big shopping mall and Station. The room is spacious with small kitchen and dinning/living room. Staff are friendly and willing to provide their assistance. Recommend traveller with kids or family.

12.review_text: I really had a good time here. The room is really clean and the staff even clean the room after we checked in. The breakfast was even good with a lot of choices! Nice room services~Really recommended!

13.review_text: Oriental Residence is nicely located in the Embassy District, only a 5-10 minute walk to the nearest BTS station. Staff is amazing and make you instantly feel at home. Thank you toall to make my stay perfect. Will be back.

14.review_text: This was the second time we stayed at this hotel. I would classify this as very high end Appartment’s with all hotel facilities. What I really like about this place are the 2 bedroom suites which gives you a full kitchen(stove etc). There’s also an en suite washing machine and drier so this makes it the perfect place for a trip with young children.  Loved the stay and everything about this place. Will be coming here again.

15.review_text: Oriental Residence is a great hotel residence that we highly recommend to travelers visiting Bangkok. Our spacious room was extremely comfortable and the staff was very helpful. I especially appreciated the concierge staff who helped me with everything - from finding shops to buy holidays gifts to planning excursions to authentic neighborhoods in town. It is conveniently located near public transport and many shopping areas. Excellent value for money too!

1.review_text: This was great stay in spite of the CV-19 restrictions.  Staff was great and always helpful.  They had taken many precautions for the pandemic, but they did not impact my stay.   I would like to not, for the first time in Bangkok, I was offered an option to have a safety equipped bath to prevent any slipping.  A wonderful option for us older folk. Brian

2.review_text: This hotel is located in the middle of city. Easy access by BTS skytrain and  just 2-3 mins walk to the Shopping Center. The staffs are really nice and helpful especially Khun Nut.  This hotel is recommended.

3.review_text: Hotel is very nice. Service is good from Ms. Nut front office staff. Housekeeping service is a bit slow. Room is comfortable and promotion is attractive with reasonable price. Breakfast is good taste.

4.review_text: The hotel is very convenient, it's in walkable distance of many restaurants and the malls. The staffs are very nice, especially K.Ploy (rsvn) well provided me the info so I got the valuable booking, K.Garfield welcomed us with the warmth, as we arrived hotel quite late, she could managed to give us late check out. Also, K.Ling was very nice to us during check out.

5.review_text: Hotel is gorgeous. It's NICE Decoration, PERFECT CLEAN and friendly staffs.   There's located by Emquartier shopping mall, easy to find. I've got an upgraded room to suite type thank you for a perfect time to celabrate birthday. Love card, Love BD decoration.   The breakfast is a variety of flavorful choices. It has thaifood, American breakfast that you can order. My personal favorite is egg onsen I didn't know how much I loved that until I tried it.   Thank you K'ling, K arunee and front team,K baiyok and team guest service agent,Thank you again for all staffs that taking a good care.   We will come back for sure.

6.review_text: Stayed here last night as we wanted to explore the Chinese New Year exhibits at EmQuartier.  Having a look around EmQuartier and with lunch under our belts drove over at 1:20 to check in (had previously noticed the hotel that would be our preferred time).   Informed that as a Hilton Diamond we had been upgraded to Exec Floor - pushed back for a Jr Suite but was told only if we wanted to wait 2+ hours to check in (previous posters had commented that even Diamonds had a hard time getting a decent upgrade and literally had to fight for it which I just didn’t have the time nor desire to due).  Evening cocktail hour were limited to “mochtails” but frankly I wasn’t aware of an alcohol ban in Bangkok, but since this changes repeatedly it could be but again just settled for an OJ. …

7.review_text: The hotel is very comfortable and located a short walk (1 minute walk) to emporium and emquartier, and very quiet. Decor is tasteful, nice shower and water pressure, super nice beds and pillows. The breakfast is the best I ever had across many hotels I stayed at in BKK.  I look forward to coming back again.

8.review_text: Location is nearby BTS stations 🚉  nearby 🛍 shopping mall .Room is good but view see a construction 🚧 hotel nearby (can understand is a business road) , Food is great and have if you have any questions ask MAGIC call (is so helpful) room so clean standard for Covid-19 when have business good plans to stay here. and last thing many thankful for great service for Khun Apple at Restaurants for good service🥛,  Khun NAME Concierge for good local information 🥘Khun Aura Duty manager or something  for a fast take action for my problem 🛀 and thank for good experience stay here (have a problem a bit for my room and some service  can understand everyone can mistakes)👌

9.review_text: I stayed with my special occasion , first when checked in with the lady she are very helpful and so nice. Unfortunately, I lucky hahaha that get a room with problem !!  Basically, room should be well inspect I think,  some point that I comment is one man duty manger at front desk he quite not action as I am expected I have to call and asking for solution by myself. But Ms. Ling she so helpful and attention with her responsibility . Lastly my stay is quite perfect!!! New room is so nice and comfy 🛀🏼 For afternoon tea that I prepaid with restaurant a bit comment that staff should arrange with high alert and verify guest before you escort cuz I’m not the right person it will be some effect as you already know 🤣. Breakfast is perfect staff pay attention with my request. Thank you…

10.review_text: It's my business stay and also my first time staying at Hilton Sukhumvit Bangkok, I was greatly greeted by the staffs at around 11-12 at night time. The room was excellent, private, and pleasantly relaxed.

11.review_text: I stay here for second time.  This time I stayed in the executive suite for 2 nights.  Accommodation: It was a wonderful time to stay in an executive suite with a separate living room, bedroom and bathroom.  The rooms are decorated in brown tones.  The living room has a beautiful set of leather sofas and a work desk. The bedroom is spacious and sleeps well.  There is a bathtub with a glass partition between bathroom and bedroom.  (I like this corner)   Food: delicious breakfast but I ordered dining in-room is shrimp fried rice and tom yum goong.  The soup tastes not like Tom Yum goong.  Lounge: although no alcoholic beverages are served during this time.  But there are many other drink options and a small set of appetizers.  That can be ordered at any time. and I would like to…

12.review_text: 近所に住んでいますが、週末のStaycationとして泊まりました。 プロンポン駅から徒歩3分ほどととても便利な場所にあります。 お部屋は広く、使いやすく快適です。 何より、お風呂とトイレが日本式で、上層階のクラブフロアのお部屋にはTOTOのウォシュレットがついていました。 ベッドの寝心地も固めでとても良いです。 不満はテレビと携帯をつなぐことができず（Screen Mirroringができない）、Youtubeが観られないことでしょうか。  そしてスタッフサービスもとても良いです。 特にフロントのGarfieldさんにはとてもよくしていただきました。 チェックインが遅い時間でクラブラウンジのアフタヌーンティが利用できなかったのですが、翌日チェックアウト後に利用ができるように手配をしてくれました。 そしてそのアフタヌーンティがとても良かったので、幸せな気持ちになりました。 ぜひまた泊まりたいと思います。  We really appreciate Ms. Garfield for her excellent service and warm attitude. For her assistance, we enjoy this stay thoroughly more than we expected. Surely, we will be back to Hilton Sukhumvit in the very near future as a Staycation, weekend pleasure!

13.review_text: I stay at Hilton Sukhumvit Bangkok 30-31 Dec 2020. Frist impression is staff at check in counter Ms. Bow , she give me the good welcome and make me comfortable. The room is very nice , breakfast is the best. I will come back again.

14.review_text: From the arrival in lobby  the team takes a considerable effort to greet you and look you in the eyes   Restaurant staff and courteous and kind, level of food in a time where others are cutting back this buffet on Saturday looked full and with something for everyone   Lastly the GM is greeting indervidual guest and checking on the service.  Team member in the restaurant "yui" needs a mention   Will be back   Only comments  I needed more than one napkin with lobster  Pouring of beer was inconsistent

15.review_text: เข้าใจว่าเป็นช่วงโควิท มีโปรลดราคา มีคนใช้สิทธิ match status กันเยอะ แต่ถ้าเทียบกับรร.อีกค่ายที่ตั้งอยู่ติดสวนเบญฯ การบริการ กับ benefits ของ member ที่ได้รับจากเข้าพักแล้ว  HH ยังห่างชั้นกับ BV อยู่ค่ะ  1.การอัพเกรดห้องที่ชอบพูดกับแขกว่า ขึ้นอยู่กับห้องว่างตอนมาเข้าเช็คอิน แต่พอเช็คอินจริงๆ ห้อง Executive ก็ขึ้นว่างในแอปเหลือๆ แต่ก็ไม่ปล่อยห้อง ให้เป็น premium ธรรมดา ที่แทบไม่แตกต่างกับ deluxe เลย (ความจริงคงแล้วแต่บุญของคนเข้าพักสินะคะ ว่าจะได้อัพเกรดห้องไปไหม จะได้สิทธิเลาจ์ไหม)  2.ไม่ให้สิทธิ Late check-out กับ elite member ขณะอีกค่ายให้ถึง 4 โมงเย็นโดยไม่ต้องรอขออะไร  3.การพูดคุยใน chat ผ่าน app พนง.customer care ใช้คำดูไม่สุภาพ บางครั้งตอบสั้นๆห้วนๆ ไม่มีความเป็นมืออาชีพ (ยกเว้น Manager) ซึ่งเพิ่งเคยเจอในแอป HH ไม่เคยเจอในฝั่ง BV มาก่อน  4.พนง.ที่นี่ดูไม่ค่อยเข้าหาแขก…

1.review_text: Just a few steps from the BTS sky train. We got Thai herb drink as a welcome drink. The room were ok for us. You can find many street foods just next to the hotel. I would recommend the restaurant called "Kra-prow", a well-known and unique Thai restaurant.

2.review_text: Perfect for a short stay in Bangkok. Conveniently located very close to the BTS station. Some great food locations within walking distance. The breakfast is decent, I ate some pink bread, it was interesting. The beds are big. The rooftop pool is great also.

3.review_text: Really great pool with a fantastic view right next to Chong Nonsi BTS station. The room we had was very big and spacious. Our only problem was that we had to get our two room keys replaced three times due to them not being able to open the door, which was extremely annoying - but putting this aside, it was a great hotel for the price

4.review_text: This is our third stay at i-Residence.  We chose this hotel because of it's location but stay because of it's staff.  One month on this occasion.  The breakfast staff are the friendliest we've ever encountered.  Nume, Samorn, Ploy, Ta, Na and Tong are all worthy of special mention.  Their service is outstanding.  The maid service - in our case Fon and Nan have been both friendly and efficient.  Additionally Pairaat (concierge) and Ball (IT) We highly recommend this hotel.  (Don and Rujiraa Schellenberg)

5.review_text: The hotel located adjacent BTs chong nongsi and its very close to cafe, convenient store and food are everywhere nearby. The front staff very responsive and quick. The rate is also not that expensive.

6.review_text: Great location near bts Chong Nonsi, friendly stuff. Not far away there is many cheap restaurants with good Thai food and there is some good restaurants too. 1100 baht is a good value for money. All the best everybody :-)

7.review_text: Friendly and helpfull staff.  Nice hotel, good Price.  We Stayed here for 4 days during our trip in Thailand. One hour from the airport. My boyfriend have stayed here before. It is placed in a good location.

8.review_text: We stayed here on our first night in Bangkok and it was disappointing, the staff were not at all friendly not once did anyone even say hello. The people at the reception desk were not a bit friendly and could only speak a little English and communication was a joke. Room was ok but we couldn’t get out of here fast enough. Check out is 12 and the power to our room was cut off right on 12. Give this place a big miss!!

9.review_text: Decent place to stay.  Rooms fine.  Breakfast good.  Rooftop pool comfatable. Nice Thai restaurant in alleyway next to hotel.  VG cheap Night market out to your right on Main Street and  then right again - in total about 10 minutes away. Close subway  station if that is your thing.

10.review_text: After a long flight arrived at hotel at 8.00 only to be told to come back at 2.00 pm , asked to use the toilet in reception it was disgusting after going for a bite to eat & finding the bank went back & waited in the reception which as also grubby with water from the air-conditioning running down the walls on to one of the sofa's. Got to out room it was ok nothing like the picture on the website, holes in the sheets & towels and water running down the walls on to the sofa in the room so couldn't sit on it, breakfast was awful the staff were very rude & the language barrier didn't help either, really glad we only stayed 3 nights would only give it 2 star maximum and that's being generous

11.review_text: I had a pleasant stay at I residence Silom. They welconed me with cool drinks and bites. The check in staff were so helpful and courteous. They attended to my queries promptly.kudos to you and to I residence hotel.. will surely stay again.

12.review_text: The location of the hotel is very good.  50 meters from the BTS, 10 minutes walk from Silom road.  The hotel is new, clean, good and helpful toolI will come back here if I have the opportunity to go bkk

13.review_text: The hotel is located in good location (Silom area). It is next to Chongnonsi BTS, just walk to down stairs. 2 mins walk to main Silom Rd, there is many restaurants, shopping mall, pubs, night market and street food.  It is good location for explore Bkk

14.review_text: Back for the 4th time.....really Like this place.  Easy to get too and close to everything (Locatoin....location....location)  Would definately recommend and come back to visit again.  Thank you I-Resident Staff.

15.review_text: It’s very comfortable hotel, very friendly personal, the breakfast is tasty. Dry cleaning and laundry service are offered to guests. Here is a pool with amazing views and good drinks. I like this hotel!

1.review_text: The hotel itself is in a good location and next to plenty of amenities as well as touristic sights and Lumpini Park is roughly 20 to 30 mins walk.  The hotel itself is old but very quaint. The pool on the roof is pretty cool and some of the views are ok. The bar itself is closed due to the pandemic. I didn't use the restaurant or have breakfast as I was out most of the time so cannot comment on that.  The room was ok, twin beds, an amazing powerful shower, toiletries, a hairdryer, and air conditioning. The room was dark and no views but I have to say, for the price I paid, it was worth it and would recommend to anyone who is on a budget. The staff are friendly and welcoming.  Overall, lovely stay for 4 days and well worth the price.  Thank you

2.review_text: It was a return visit and we were warmly welcomed back to this comfortable hotel. Some people have said that it's dated but to me, that's part of the charm. The rooftop pool area is a wonderful place to sit and the breakfast is a treat.

3.review_text: This hotel was booked for me by my tour company. I did not feel welcomed at check-in. I had a non-smoking room (412) but it was on a smoking floor, so not a good location. My keycard didn’t not work. The bellboy who delivered my suitcase said he would bring another one. I waited. Then a housekeeping person turned on the lights with his card and I asked if they were bringing another one for me. He said no. Then I called reception and I had to tell them my room number four times before they could understand “Four, one, two.” Finally, I got a working keycard. My room and bathroom were very dated, sad, dark, and not as clean as I would like. I asked if I could pay extra and get a room like those pictured in the elevator. They showed me a suite, bigger but just as sad. When I went to the bar for my “Welcome Drink,” I wasn’t welcomed. There was no choice. The server just put a glass of pineapple juice in front of me. The breakfast was okay, nothing special. …

4.review_text: Stayed her 3 nights and i wanted some space not an hostel. Spacious room indeed, great location, a bit outdated furnitures but very clean. All in all, good deal for the money. So many food and point of interests within walking distance. Employees are courteous and breakfast is very satisfying. You can access your room without going through the lobby if you are scared of walk of shame *smile*. BST within walking distance. I will go back for sure.

5.review_text: Siam Heritage in Silom area provides a mix of value, comfort & convenience. Because it's  located in a budget district and near Patpong Night Market. The Skytrain station is 8-minute walk & The Silom Complex is 12-minutes walk from the hotel. Massage shops and Nightlife centers are in a short distance. For those interested in popular landmarks of Bangkok, the Siam Heritage is located a short distance from  (Wat Traimit) (2 km) & Chinatown (2 km) & 7 km from the 18th Grand Palace. This relaxed hotel with wooden doors and décor provides a spa, and an outdoor rooftop pool . Dated rooms & decoration and low degree cleanness are some weak points of this hotel.

6.review_text: I last reviewed this hotel six years ago – in November 2013. Then I wrote “The rooms are spacious and in good condition, although not newly renovated.” Since then, NO renovation has taken place. So today, the hotel appears somewhat tired and worn out. Most of the interior is run-down – even the cutlery in the breakfast restaurant is battered. The nice rooftop poolside area too is crumbling. Despite many good things to say, the place really needs a refurbishment. Still, the location is great – in central Bangkok only a few meters from Pat Pong. The staff is still smiling, friendly, helpful and makes your stay comfortable and easy, but it’s time for a facelift. For this reason, my rating drops from “Excellent” to “Average”.  PS: We spent Christmas in The Siam Heritage Hotel. Very…

7.review_text: the   room   is  so  nice  and  spacious   and  clean   nice  people  too  and  staff ...  nice  buffet  if  you  include  break fast   in  your  stay  ❤️❤️❤️  and  then  when  you  go  out  everything   is  there  close   to  all kind  if  store   your  looking  for    and  it  LGBT  friendly  place   too     i  love  the  pool  area  ❤️❤️❤️  i  enjoy  my  stay  here

8.review_text: A wonderful hotel central to the Patpong market. Superb morning breakfast served with a delightful smile by Mort. Rooms were comfortable and held all the nessities for your stay. We enjoyed a wonderful lunch at the siam cuisine restaurant at the entrance to this hotel. Also run by the staff at this hotel. The rooftop pool area on the top floor was enjoyed to escape the heat of the day giving you some views of the city. We walked to nearby lumpini park and rooftop bar at the Marriott is nearby. we also enjoyed our massages at nearby massage establishments. Staff very friendly , and hotel is thoroughly recomended.

9.review_text: The Hotel is clean and well presented, the staff are extraordinarily helpful and courteous. The rooms are large and well appointed, the pool is fine for a dip enjoy a bit of sun. The only down side there is limited views and the Hotel can do nothing about that. Everything they are in control of is perfect for me!!

10.review_text: What a fantastic hotel, good breakfast, spacious rooms, very friendly staff.  Hotel is centrally located next to Patpong market, great concierge with competitive prices for airport transport.  All staff do speak english despite other reviews saying otherwise,  All staff very professional and friendly.

11.review_text: A friend and I spent four wonderful days here recently. We loved the traditional Thai style and decor, the comfortable beds, and the friendly helpful  staff. This is a great place to begin your exploration of a very exciting city. Morning breakfast buffets were great and the breakfast manager delightful. There’s a Jim Thompson Silk Store just three blocks away with some of the finest designs anywhere. We had dinner at the Ruen Urai in the Rose Hotel nearby for some great Thai food, took a cab to Siam Paragon, one of the world’s great shopping experiences nearby. Check out their fabulous food court. The famous Patpong night Market is two blocks away.ATM’s are very close. Use the ones on the left of the hotel. The nightclub scene starts heating up after 10 pm. And we enjoyed…

12.review_text: Excellent place to stay, if you want small, boutique hotel that's a bit different. Friendly staff (English limited), central position for shopping, nightlife, night market, etc., very near the skytrain, and quiet. Room comfortable and clean, bathroom good, air-conditioning pretty strong (I hate it and always turn it off when I'm in the room). Lovely small pool on the roof, decent breakfast (buffet style), and such a relief not to be in another corporate hotel. Plenty of places to eat around, including street food, but a small restaurant attached to the hotel with good, value for money food. Would recommend to all who want something a little different, and maybe a touch old fashioned (a complement in my book)

13.review_text: The only reason I opted for this hotel was that my office was very near. So coming to the hotel. The staff is very good, though there is communication gap as they dont understand english well but still its managable. The breakfast provided in the hotel is nice. Lot of varieties but no vegetarian options.  For meals like lunch and dinner, if you want to go for thai food, the restaurant offers some good dishes. Hotel is quite old build but maintained well. Rooms are big enough but there are no views from the windows.  Overall I would rate the hotel at 7 out of 10.

14.review_text: This hotel was selected because it seemed to be in the center of Bangkok and it was an authentic Thai hotel.  The hotel staff was very welcoming and friendly.  The room was a nice size, very clean.  They do have a fitness center on the top floor but the day I went there the tread mill was not working.  Also the top floor had a bar and tables, pretty plants, etc. - very lovely.

15.review_text: This was my first time at the Siam Heritage, but not my first time in Bangkok.  The staff was great including a sweet, grandmother who ran the roof-top pool bar.  The area was beautiful and a great respite from the nearly 100 degree whether in the afternoon.  She took care of me everyday and I ate most of my lunches and dinners up there.  The daily buffet breakfast was very good and a bright smiling trainee made me an omelette every day.   I want to come back again soon.

1.review_text: this is very good hotel in bangkok , i like it . the service is so nice i very like it  the place is near for shopping outside hotel  and near to everywhere this is the recomended hotel in bangkok good good good

2.review_text: Booked the hotel with breakfast - the best decision made!  Having the meal on the 77th or 81st floor of the tallest hotel in Thailand was a fantastic experience, enjoying the nice views while eating.  Breakfast selection was very good too.  House guests also have access to the revolving deck on the 84th floor for the 360 deg view of the city.  The hotel location is excellent, near to the train station and many shopping areas.  The hotel also provides one way shuttle service to some touristy places like the Chatuchak weekend market.   Room is spacious and service very good.  Food at the cafe on the 18th floor was very good too.   Will probably stay here again if we return to Bangkok again.

3.review_text: Very disappointed with the stay at this hotel. Told at check in, we had been upgraded, but the room was very dated. Room smelled very weird like old people. Had a menu in the room, but not in english. My partner ordered food from the delivery service but wasn't cooked properly.  I booked via email to have our dinner on floor 81st floor, so we could be outside but on arrival, they just put us on floor 82. When requested could we go down to floor 81, this was refused. Found this to be unacceptable.   On floor 82nd , the food was very average and not enough options.

4.review_text: The suite room is very spacious and clean. Location is very good. The building is a little old but we are satisficed the we got the suite room which was newly renovated. Service overall is good. Highly recommended to family staycation.!!!

5.review_text: The views from the rooms are great, but the hotel condition is very average, and not worth the price you pay. I am giving it the points for the view only. But if the weather is rainy, or smoggy, you won't get to enjoy that either. So if you are planning to stay here cos of the view, check the weather on your phone app (Openweather, Aeris, Climacell, or any other) for visibility conditions.

6.review_text: Our stay at Baiyoke was below average. Firstly we booked for Kloud Kissing package, 3998 THB per night.   As we wanted to celebrate my wife's belated birthday. The room was great, the bed was very comfortable, and the view was amazing.    Besides that everything was bad.   This is because of a lack of communication, management and organisation inside the hotel.   When we checked-in the receptionist man didn’t give us the voucher for the dinner. He provided us with misleading information. He told us they have reserved a table for us on the 81st floor and we just have to collect the voucher at 2 pm. I asked him three times and, he gave me the same answer, “window seat for two people on the 81st floor for tonight”.I believed him.    At 2 pm when I went to collect the voucher they…

7.review_text: We have been regular guest at The Baiyoke Sky for a long time.  They have recently upgraded their rooms and are a much better hotel now. However, some of the linen are quite old and needs to be changed.  Overall a very nice hotel and the staff are especially friendly. The only thing we have discovered is their breakfast buffet is no longer as good, the spread is very much last then before.

8.review_text: 24 hour package included sunset cocktail, breakfast, massage, golf, Chinese seafood buffet, breakfast access to observation decks, free golf  and room on 72nd floor - at 4000 Thb for 2 was good deal   Good   Excellent customer service great staff and plenty of staff to help.  Fast elevators - although system a little complicated staff always available to put you in correct elevator   Seafood Chinese buffet good, although lunch menu a little limited .  Drinks reasonable price   The revolving observation deck was great fun we went 3 times morning , day and night time  Massage good   Not so good   Room and decor is outdated ! Looks more 80s than 90s hotel needs a refurb - public areas worn and outdated too sky bar seats worn   Room was high but structural internal beams blocked…

9.review_text: What a great hotel with a good city view. Strategy location near to the night market.  Nice hotel to spend time with family. The bar view is incredible and also the food is good. Will back and stay in this hotel again

10.review_text: This was a very good place! The staff is very good! The rooms very very old school- just the way I like it! I love this hotel! But I have rated this 4 stars because this property  is haunted! I experienced eerie chills and weird things, too! But the ghosts were helpful as they helped me find my I Pad in my overcrowded bag!

11.review_text: The hotel is clean and the staff are very helpful. It is near to the street market and is within walking distance. There is a 7-11 shop right across the hotel and also another in the lobby which is convenient for snacks. We had an enjoyable stay.

12.review_text: guests often complain about strange and unexplainable things, including items mysteriously vanishing, spooky noises and eerie chills. Watch out for dark shadows and be prepared to feel a little off balance if you check into a room here.

13.review_text: The hotel room is well equipped and clean and what is very important , the view from hotel room is amazing. Even better view , we had during the breakfast, where we were sitting sit on the terrace and admire Bangkok from the sky :) The breakfast was simply delicious  (huge choice of dishes prepared on highest level). I travel a lot and this breakfast beats the competition:)  And what it the most important, the staff, these people are so nice and helpful, amazing. I really recommend this place. I will back there definitely.

14.review_text: Special mention to Mr. Manolo Papag, who extended multiple assistance to our group, not just within the hotel premises but everything that we needed for our family tour in Bangkok.  Given another chance to visit Bangkok again, i would highly recommend this hotel to anyone and everyone.  With its very spacious rooms, one would feel so relaxed and  comfortable .  Not to mention all the other amenities it offers to its clientele, swimming pool, bar, the SUPERB service its staff in practically all units, as they respond so wuickly to whatever should be fixed, etc.  Congratulations to the warm people of your team and hope to have the same experience on our next visit.   Dr. Nenitha L. Junio Bacoor City, Cavite Philippines

15.review_text: Stayed many times. Good location with many shopping areas. Good breakfast spread. Reservation manager was always helpful, everything went smoothly for my request, airport transfer and changed of room type.

1.review_text: Looking a little jaded but still a wonderful 5* hotel. The service was exceptional, we couldn't even press a button for the lift! The famous sky bar is well worth a visit for the views alone. Currently the promotion price is exceptional value for money. They upgraded us to a high floor and granted us a 2pm check out when requested.

2.review_text: We stayed for daughter’s birthday by direct booking to hotel. They asked purpose of stay, budget, request carefully and in detail. Welcoming is so nice with heartfelt, room is clean, needless to say view of Chaopraya river is wonderful. Most impressive memory is all the employee’s conscientiousness for welcoming guest. Sure it hard to find such a hotel. Thanks for 3 staffs who sing a birthday song for my daughter!!!

3.review_text: Made us feel very unwelcome and uncomfortable on arrival,  just put a downer on our stay in Bangkok made us not want to visit again, remember you after pay 10,000 baht deposit on arrival we was not made aware of this and it was our last night before flying home and at to withdraw this amount out of bank obviously not going to use it after has we was travelling home next day. The man that welcomed us was really rude and looked at us like we didn’t belong there we travel around a lot of the world and when he said about the 10,000 baht deposit we said we wasn’t made aware of this he said well if you travel often you would. I’ve stayed in many hotels all over the world and never at to do this. Terrible stay I didn’t feel comfortable using any part of the hotel after this we literally went out of the hotel are stayed in our room.  Absolutely lovely hotel and beds are so comfortable this man just ruined our stay for us…

4.review_text: We have been coming to the Lebua for 8 years and it is by far the best hotel in Bangkok.  Our stay was during COVID and this hotel takes care and meets the need of the health and safety of the guests.  Every detail from food to in room.  The entire staff is so professional and friendly speaking English and Thai.  The management team is incredible and the entire hotel staff is wonderful.  Food and beverage top rating and service persons amazing.  The special needs top score goes to housekeeping.....every need from amenities to clean rooms is perfect We will return to the Lebua as we always do.....thank you for making our stay most excellent

5.review_text: Stayed at the Lebua for a Staycation on Feb 13-14 for valentine day weekend with my girlfriend. The staff were so nice and helpful. They upgraded our room to a bigger room for free. The room was massive with assortments of tea and coffee. The rooftop dinner at the Sirocco was amazing and very delicious. The staff were very helpful with taking photos of us and had personalised lights to help take better pictures. This was an amazing staycation and would definitely come back here one day! I would definitely recommend a stay at the Lebua and dinner at the Sirocco is a must-do as a  lifetime bucket list

6.review_text: I booked a stay here for my birthday and the whole experience was exceptional! Fantastic 5* service from every member of staff and they go above and beyond to make sure everything is perfect. The comfiest bed I have ever slept on, beautiful balcony views, a lovely bath and shower with shampoo and conditioner that made my hair very soft! 😍 Nespresso coffee machine and twinings tea in the room. Delicious breakfast and they brought a complementary cake to my room for my birthday. Thank you so much, can't wait to stay again! ✨

7.review_text: The great time well spend at Lebua State Tower. The services are very impressive. All stafffs are well train to make sure that all guests feel comfartable. I do not need to ask for anything. Staffs are so much ready to provide anything for me. I have to admit that the service at this hotel are the best.

8.review_text: It was very great staycation during the Covid situation. All lebua staff is very friendly. They always greet the guests politely. The Mezzaluna restaurant was also super good with 7 courses meal. I recommended it

9.review_text: I made it a point to log into my Tripadvisor account and write a review for my recent stay at Lebua at state tower, i stayed there during the New year's eve period and i must admit the stay was superb ! i would like to emphasize that the staff were probably one of the best i have come across staying at various hotels in Thailand, extremely  professional , polite and helpful , starting from the parking attendants, to bellboys, to front desk and the management etc, everyone was great  ! they gave us the room we requested for with a great view of the fireworks on a high floor and even provided us with a special wedding anniversary pastry as it was around that period, the food and breakfast was also very good including the executive lounge snack etc.. considering the building is old…

10.review_text: The hotel does not care about spacing. Many guests Not enough management Elevator and breakfast were not queued. Keep distance Including wearing a surgical mask  **The restaurant is crowded with no social distance**

11.review_text: Impressive from the beginning. Perfect five - star service at every turn.  The suite at the 58th floor had everything including views to remember.   Pool and fitness were excellent.   The club room service, delicious food and beverages that never ended were like a bite of true bliss.  Cannot wait to return.   Although the Skybars' drinks were out of our budget, the view and vibe were awesome. The staff went out of their way to assist with hundreds of pictures. Instsgram Heroes!

12.review_text: It has been really good to stay in your hotel during christmas eve. Front team, restaurant team was very nice and helpful  thank you for making good memories during christmas eve.  Merry christmas and Happy new year 2021

13.review_text: The hotel is luxurious and the staff are very service-oriented. Glad to hear the hotel kept all their staff employed despite the current pandemic. The views from our balcony on the 58th floor is superb, overlooking the scenic Chao Phraya river. Don't hesitate to get the Club lounge upgrade, you'll have access to unlimited food and drinks all day, both alcoholic and not.  We had a great time and is planning to comeback again for our anniversary next year.

14.review_text: Hotel staff is so friendly & service is better , we enjoyed our stay with upgraded room from superior to suite 😁, we recommend this hotel who want to enjoy city view of Bangkok with rooftop bar , cheers 🍻

15.review_text: Khun Korn(Chinnakorn) is the highlight of Sirocco.He is  superb to service every guest that join to the restaurant area.He always help us to take a photo in the highlight area that was very impressed us and shout out to Khun Cat also.She is the very helpful concierge and take us sightseeing around the building.We think that we will spread out to our friend about the fantastic service and fastastic place.We will come back again definitely.Distil Bar service also is well-done too.Thanks much everyone for the best experience as the 5 star hotel.

1.review_text: I booked the hotel because of the positive reviews given here: friendly, accomodating staffs, clean spacious room, good breakfast, and 15 minutes walk to the blue line MRT which you can go downtown, Chinatown, Chatuchak without changing lines and I am not disappointed!  The 7-11 is just located next door and taxis outside the hotel are aplenty.  The breakfast is quite tasty with decent varieties. The food are replenished often even towards the end of breakfast time, 10am. The breakfast area, located at the lobby area is spacious and nice.    There are many massages shops along the way to MRT (Hua Khwang station) and the prices are generally cheaper than town area.  The walk to the MRT is around 15 minutes - good way to keep fit.  I am very happy with the stay and I am coming back to the hotel again in a few weeks time! this time with my family.…

2.review_text: Really enjoyd my stay here at Atrium. Not in the middle of the fastest traffic but you get easy with tuktuk or taxi where ever you want. Staff is friendly and wants to help you, they dont speak really good english but i dont speak either and still we did manage to understand eachother.

3.review_text: I stayed here for about two nights. The hotel is visibility nicer once inside. A larger open reception area joined with the dining room. If there were someone there to take my bags upstairs then it would possibly fit the part that the hotel is trying to give off — a boutique resort. Nonetheless, the rooms were spacious, hot water and wifi worked fine. I enjoyed the view from my room. The bed was one of the most comfortable that I’ve stayed in in Bangkok. Housekeeping was daily, elevator worked fine. There was also a nice breakfast buffet. There is a 7-11 right next to the hotel which is convenient.  The one downfall is the location — it is not a 15 minute walk to the MRT. I typically walk and take the BTS or MRT, yet I used Grab to get to the MRT because it was just easier than walking.   Overall, I did enjoy my stay here, however, just be aware that the location is probably not ideal if you don’t like walking to get to the public transportation. Unless time is not an issue.  …

4.review_text: I stayed two nights at the Atrium Boutique and have zero complaints. I booked the hotel because of the price point and to explore a different area just north of the Sukhumvit area that is still accessible by MRT. I got off at the Huay Kwang station and walked a few blocks taking in the sites and sounds of a smaller China town like atmosphere. This is said to be an area that is still affordable to invest or stay just outside of the busy areas of Bangkok but like I said still accessible and a little closer to Don Mueang Airport.The Ganesha shrine is very close to Huay Kwang station and the Rot fai night market is not far either. The hotel was a little older but very charming and served an Asian style breakfast that was quite adequate. Every time I entered the lobby Morning or night  there was a player piano playing which made for a very nice atmosphere . I also found some amazing thai massage shops for  250 baht an hour as well as some great local dining experiences . I recommend you give this hotel a try if you’re looking to expand your area a little bit.Definitely on my next visit list !…

5.review_text: I stayed here for 5 nights the place is great. The staff are excellent and do everything to try to make you feel like family  I am going to pattaya for a week and then have rebooked here again. And a bonus the breakfast buffet is great as well

6.review_text: The family room for 3 is clean and tidy. Housekeeping are doing a good job on that. However, it will be bit far off from those tourism places. such as going to visit the Grand Palace, Wat Arun and so forth. Even takes about 15 mins to reach the MRT station. I would give an average score for the stay.

7.review_text: It’s very unfortunate to write this as it may cost the rice bowl of someone and maybe the reputation of the Hotel. But this is something I am very sure of and it is very disappointing.  I bought SGD 500+ into Bangkok and exchanged SGD 300 into THB, leaving me with a SGD 100 note and 2 SGD 50 notes. On the last day, the SGD 100 note is missing and 1 out of 2 THB 1000 note is missing.  The manager says only she has access not the housekeeper. I suppose that is the end of it. I do not have time to make a police report as I have to catch a flight.  I am very sure of what I put in the safe and what is missing.

8.review_text: Very good for the price, this was higher quality than expected. The location is not ideal though as it is 15/20 minutes from the metro station which is not central. The swimming pool is just perfect after a hot day in the city. There are many massage shops in the area and a 7/eleven just next door. Very great to rest after a long trip.

9.review_text: The staff are good accommodating....food are more choices ..its near or walking distace to the  market..rooms are big and reasonable price..thank you to all staff...am proud to recommend to all travelers

10.review_text: Love this hotel they have a variety of foods for breakfast, the staff are very nice there’s one guy who played piano in the lobby every night makes our stay more relaxing. There’s a 7/11 next to the hotel. I just love everything nothing fancy yet it’s an awesome and relaxing stay! Thanks Atrium! This is the view from our room

11.review_text: This is a lovely hotel. The hotel is clean, the staff are very friendly and welcoming, lovely food, but it is a bit out of the way. Not very central. There is a train station not far from the hotel but its a little too far to walk in 40° heat, not too far when the weather is cooler.

12.review_text: We have spent 4 days at the hotel. Hotel staff was very flexible & rich with hospitality. They went out of their way to help us to celebrate our daughter's birthday at breakfast.  The Manager Ms. ELY & her staff was very warm and responsible. They look into each guest's requirements. I would highly recommend this resort to any Asian visit Bangkok.

13.review_text: This hotel is worth to stay comparing to the rate incl. ABF. The room is big especially it was CLEAN!!!!!!!  The staff are very friendly. There is a free parking for hotel guest.  24 hour reception and easy to catch a taxi.

14.review_text: What a bummer i would say, guest relations needs training. Made a phone call 3 times before making the booking just to make sure that early checked in is allowed because i was just traveling 17 hours by land, 2 staff on the phone said yes, once i arrived they asked for early checked in fee that cost as much as the room a night, and also during my stay, trying to get drinks at night and the staff rolled her eyes at me because i was just asking a question “why can’t i buy wine by glass?” I am not talking about the language barrier here, but as a 30 years old i’d like to be talked with manner, you just dont crossed your hand and screamed NO on my face just because i was trying to play piano, i am not a 6 years old child, and when i replied “excuse me” the lady in the cafe just…

15.review_text: Booked for one night as had a late night flight the following evening. First impression after walking from MRT was that it was a lot further than anticipated...not really ideal for us. Walking from the MRT the area was not the best either and what we found, especially at night time was that the area became very "seedy"- not somewhere Id feel safe walking on my own. The hotel has definitely seen better days and is not what I would call "boutique". Our room floor was still soaking wet having just been mopped down when we entered and there was def a smell of smoke both in the carpeted hallway as well as the room. Although the room had everything we needed it was just a little worn around the edges. Breakfast was good though and offered lots of choice alongside freshly prepared eggs…

1.review_text: This is a simple hotel at a rate which corresponds to what is offered. There is no view but the location is very good as all necessary facilities are at a walking distance, thus one avoids the notorious Bangkok traffic. I did not have breakfast, but the room was cleaned efficiently whenever I wished, and enjoyed large space and all standard facilities. One strange thing was that there is no hot water at the sink, so shaving is not simple. Another that room keys (plastic cards) must be returned upon departure; if not, they would cost you 200 Thai baht each! The front desk staff and porter were very friendly! All in all, the hotel is recommended for an enjoyable stay at a reasonable price.

2.review_text: Stayed in the Raya for the 4th time at the end of my April trip  Had the misfortune of staying at a nearby hotel earlier on the trip as the Raya was sold out and the 2 hotels are like chalk and cheese. Staff as friendly and welcoming as ever. Excellent location and brilliant air conditioning  Had an issue one evening with the fire alarm going off. Staff were on our floor within seconds and identified the room where a gang of Chinese guys were smoking e-cigarettes and set off the fire alarm.   Felt great comfort that both the alarm and staff were so responsive to the issue   The Chinese guests also looked suitably embarrassed by the inconvenience they caused.  Highly recommended, they are really underselling themselves with their 3* rating. Should be 4*+

3.review_text: I have slept one night at this boutique hotel in patpong area.  Rooms are big and clean The syle of the room is really cool The bed is comfy and clean They offer also smoking rooms option Located in patpong area very near to bts as well The room can be completely blinded Breakfast is good quality and fairly wide choice Price/quality ratio is amazing

4.review_text: Near to Patpong Night Market,BTS,night life and restaurant.Value for money,friendly staff,clean and quite，small cafe to have your morning breakfast.Having a pleasant stay and will be stay again when the next trip going over to Bangkok.

5.review_text: Stayed at The Raya Surawong for 2 nights with my family.
